113a2(khri brgyad): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad pa dag gis dben par yang dag par shes na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 
113a3(khri brgyad): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa' rje su yi rang ba'i modo las skyes pa'i
113a4(khri brgyad): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni rje su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes dpa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rang bzhin gyis dben par ya dang dag par shes shing / sangs rgyas bco
113a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang dge ba byas rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa yang
113a6(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / yongasu bsngo ba'i sems kyang yongs su bsngo
113a7(khri brgyad): ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / byang chub kyang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
113a8(khri brgyad): gyis dben pa dang // de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / brjod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
113b1(khri brgyad): rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun
113b2(khri brgyad): dang stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
113b3(khri brgyad): rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag par shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dben pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/ de ni
113b4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan
113b5(khri brgyad): 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par rje su drad pa/ 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ gang gis yongs su
113b6(khri brgyad): bsngo ba'i sems de ni yongs su bsngo ba de ji lta ba de kho na bzhin te/ de'i rang bzhin dang / de'i ngo bo nyid yin par gal te de ltar yang dag par shes na/ bla na med pa yang
113b7(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// de ltar yongs su bsngo ba ni/ 'du shes phyin ci log pa ma yin/ sems phyin ci log pa ma yin/ lta ba
113b8(khri brgyad): phyin ci log pa ma yino// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i
114a1(khri brgyad): / rtsa bde dag mtshan pa'i tshul gyis shes na/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngob ma yin no// gal te 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
114a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i yul ma yin pa de dag 'di ltar dran par byas shing mtshan mar 'dzin par byed na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa
114a3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba ma yin te/ de ltar na de ni 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log pa yin no// gal
114a4(khri brgyad): te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa bde dag dang / mngon par 'du byed pa de dag dang // sem sa bskyed pa de dag shes par mi byed cing / 
114a5(khri brgyad): mtshan mar mi 'dzin na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems da / 
114a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po de'i 'du shes phyin ci log pa ma yin/ sems phyin ci log pa ma yin/ lta ba phyin ci log pa ma yin no// byams pas smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
114a7(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan mar yang mi 'dzin la/ yongs su bsngo bar yang byed pa yang ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems
114a8(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la thabs mkhas pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa
114b1(khri brgyad): thabs la mkhas par rig par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa marten par ni bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bsngo bar yang mi nus so// byams pas smras pa/ 
114b2(khri brgyad): btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang // mngon par 'du byed pa de dag/ bla na med pa yang
114b3(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag kyang med pa yin na/ 'di skyon du mi 'gyur ram/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
114b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni 'di ltar rnam par brtag par bya ste/ sku de dag kyang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa de dag ni 'gags pa yin
114b5(khri brgyad): na/ 'on kyang mtshan mar bzung nas/ rnam par rtog par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / mngon par
114b6(khri brgyad): 'du mdzad pa de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag mtshan mar bzung nas rnam par rtog par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
114b7(khri brgyad): rnams kyis ni// de ltar mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la/ rje su yi rang bar gnang bar mi mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su
114b8(khri brgyad): myangs las 'das bdag mtshan marang 'dzin cing / rnam par brtags nas dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i dmigs pa chen ma yin pa'i phyir ro// de bas na byang chub sem
115a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongasu bsngo bar 'dod pas ni/ dmigs pas mtshan mar bzung ste yongasu bsngo bar mi bya'o// 
115a2(khri brgyad): dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang // mtshan ma'i 'du shes kyis yongasu bsngo ba ni// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
115a3(khri brgyad): don meb ma gsung so// de ci'i byer na na/ bsngo ba de ni drug dang bcas pa/ zug rngu dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro// 'di lta ste dper na/ kha zas bsod pa dang dug
115a4(khri brgyad): dang spyang ba/ kha dog dang dri dang ldan pa de la byis pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mis bza' bar bsams nas/ des za ba na kha dog dang dris kyang dga' bar byed la/ 
115a5(khri brgyad): zhu bo'i tshe ni sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par smin par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du 'di la kha cig log par zin pa dang / log par shes pa dang / log par bslabs pas don ma
115a6(khri brgyad): rtogs te/ khong du ma chud par 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs
115a7(khri brgyad): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya
115a8(khri brgyad): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / ji srid du dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur gyi bar der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
115b1(khri brgyad): mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang yin pa rnams dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
115b2(khri brgyad): spyad pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang yin pa rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
115b3(khri brgyad): po bzhi dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
115b4(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad
115b5(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yod su dag par mdzad cing / sems can rnams yongs su smin
115b6(khri brgyad): par mdzad pa dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol
115b7(khri brgyad): ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa dag dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar dang bsrel ba mi mang
116a1(khri brgyad): rgyas rnams lung bstan pa gang yin pa dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / 
116a2(khri brgyad): mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po gang dag gis de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byas pa de dag thams cad yongs su bsdus nas/ gcig tu btul cing gzhal te/ bla na
116a3(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos shig ces ston par byed de/ de ltar des yongs su bsngo ba mtshan ma'i tshul dang // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
116a4(khri brgyad): yongasu bsngos pa ni 'di lta ste/ kha zas dug can bzhin du dug nyid 'gyur ro// dmigs par lta ba'i bsngo ba ni bsngo bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dmig
116a5(khri brgyad): ba de ni dug dang bcas pa mtshan ma dang bcas pa/ rgyu dang bcas pa/ rkyen dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de ltar bsngos pas ni de bzhin gshegs
116a6(khri brgyad): pa la skur pa btab pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba yang ma yin no// chos smra ba yang ma yi nan zhes brtag par bya'o// de la rigs
116a7(khri brgyad): kyi bu 'tshe rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag gis ni 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bco
116a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la ji ltar rje su yi rang nas yongasu bsngo bar bya// thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams
116b1(khri brgyad): phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / ji srid du dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar der/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
116b2(khri brgyad): la spyad pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang yin pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa nyid kyi bar dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
116b3(khri brgyad): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bar dag la ji ltar rjes su yid rang nas yongasu
116b4(khri brgyad): bsngo bar bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji ltar yongs su bsngos na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar 'gyur zhe na/ rigs kyi
116b5(khri brgyad): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa 'di la spyod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pagadab par mi 'dod pas ni/ 'di skad
116b6(khri brgyad): du yongasu bsngo bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
116b7(khri brgyad): de dag ji ltar thugasu chud pa dang / rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid gang yin pa dang // mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang // chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du/ 
116b8(khri brgyad): bdag kyang rjes su yid rang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldanan de dag gis ji ltar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
117a1(khri brgyad): chub tu yongasu bsngo bo zhes rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
117a2(khri brgyad): tu yong su bsngo bar bya'o// de ltar yongs su bsngos na// de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab par mi 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du
117a3(khri brgyad): smra ba dang / chos smra bar yang 'gyur ro// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po de'i yongasu bsngo ba de dug med pa yin no zhes bslab par bya'o// gzhan
117a4(khri brgyad): ying rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyod pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'idi
117a5(khri brgyad): dag 'di ltar yong su bsngo bar bya'o// 'di ltar gzugs ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / ga zugs med pa'i kham su gtogs pa ma
117a6(khri brgyad): yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i
117a7(khri brgyad): khams su gtogs pa ma yin no// de bzhin du khoms rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzug
117a8(khri brgyad): kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i kham su gtogs pa ma yin no// de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / 
117b1(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa yin no// ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa
117b2(khri brgyad): yong ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin no// da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dod
117b3(khri brgyad): pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khamasu gtogs pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs
117b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin no// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
117b5(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khamasu gtogs pa ma yin no// de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba
117b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang // chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos spyod med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
117b7(khri brgyad): dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
117b8(khri brgyad): gzigs pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa 'dod pa dang / 
118a1(khri brgyad): gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te/ ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin
118a2(khri brgyad): ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar gtogs pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ma gtog so// de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba yang gtogs pa ma yin
118a3(khri brgyad): chos gang la yongasu bsngo ba'i chos de dag kyang gtogs pa ma yin no// yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de yang gtogs pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
118a4(khri brgyad): 'das de dag kyang gtogs pa ma yin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang gtogs pa ma yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang gtogs pa ma yin no// de dge
118a5(khri brgyad): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin te// ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa
118a6(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin// da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// zhes yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
118a7(khri brgyad): pas/ gal te 'di ltar shes te// gzugs gang yin pa de ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i kham su gtogs pa ma yin/ 
118a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khamasu gtog
118b1(khri brgyad): pa ma yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa
118b2(khri brgyad): ma yin te/ ma gtogs pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin// ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/ de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/ dmigs
118b3(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis/ yongs su bsngo bar mi nuso// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de la ni dngos po med pa ste/ dngos po med
118b4(khri brgyad): ni dngos po med pas yong su bsngo bar mi nus so// tshor// ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / khams rnams
118b5(khri brgyad): dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin no// sbyin pa'i pharo la tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
118b6(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
118b7(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bang du yang de bzhin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so la
118b8(khri brgyad): dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / 
119a1(khri brgyad): rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa yang de bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa ma yin na kyi man cad mal tu gnas pa ma yin te/ ma rtags pa dang
119a2(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no// gang 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba
119a3(khri brgyad): yang ma yin pa de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yong su bsngo bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la rang bzhin med de/ gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos
119a4(khri brgyad): 'o med pa yin la/ dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pa sa yongs su bsngo bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// zhes bya ba/ shes na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sems bsngod
119a5(khri brgyad): de drug med pa yin no// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang mam na ma'i nul dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba
119a6(khri brgyad): de dag yong su bsngo bar byed pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag log pa yongs su bsngo ba yin te/ yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ma yin/ log par yongasu bsngo ba la ni/ sangs rgyas
119a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa mi mdzad do// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa ma mdzad pa'i yongs su bsngobs yongasu bsngo ba de ni/ sbyin pal
119a8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par mi byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
119b1(khri brgyad): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi byed do// gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongasu rdzogs par mi byed pa de ni/ byang chub
119b2(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par mi byed do// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / stobs rnams dang / mi
119b3(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi byed de/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
119b4(khri brgyad): dag par mi byed do// sems can rnams yongasu smin par mi byed do// gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams yongasu smin par mi byed pa
119b5(khri brgyad): de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i bsngo ba ni dug dang bcwa
119b6(khri brgyad): pa yin pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
119b7(khri brgyad): 'das de dag gi chos nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// zhes thugasu chud pa de lta bur bdag gis kyang de ltar chos nyid des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
119b8(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor legs
120a1(khri brgyad): leg so rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongasu bsngo ba'i phung po mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / dmigs
120a2(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'byung ba med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / dngos po
120a3(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang // de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang / 
120a4(khri brgyad): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gyis bstan pa ni leg so// rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can 'khod pa de dag thams
120a5(khri brgyad): cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las kyi lam rnams thob pa ra gyur cing / bsam gtan bani dang // tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
120a6(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag gi zhi de las bsod nams 'ang skyed snyam 'am/ rab 'byor
120a7(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lag so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ngas na/ rigs kyi
120a8(khri brgyad): lungs rigs kyi bu mo gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gos pa med pas yongasu bsngos na/ de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am
120b1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo do'i dge ba yongs su bsngo ba de lta bu de ni mchog ces bya/ phul du byung ba zhes bya// gtso bo zhes bya// rab ces bya/ rab mchog ces bya/ rgya nom pa zhes bya/ bla
120b2(khri brgyad): na med pa zhes bya// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams
120b3(khri brgyad): cang rgyun du zhugs par gyur tam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom par gyur nas/ dgra bcom pa de dag thams cad la rigs kyi
120b4(khri brgyad): bu 'am rigs bu mo la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/ gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnam
120b5(khri brgyad): kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed mchod par byed na/ rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de gzhi de las ches
120b6(khri brgyad): bsod nams mang du bskyed snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lag so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
120b7(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba gos pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongasu bsngo na/ de ches bsod nam
120b8(khri brgyad): mang du bskyed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can 'khod pa de dag thams cad la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
121a1(khri brgyad): la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du
121a2(khri brgyad): byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed na// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las ches bsod nams mang du
121a3(khri brgyad): bskyed snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa mang lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ 
121a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba gos pa med pa'i yongasu bsngos pas yongs su bsngos na/ de ches bsod nam
121a5(khri brgyad): mang du bskyed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad bla na med
121a6(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur la/ der byang chub sems dpa' de dag re re la yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
121a7(khri brgyad): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / 
121a8(khri brgyad): na ba'i gses sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing / bde ba'i yo byad rnams kyis bkur bstir byed/ 
121b1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams rnams dang / steng dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
121b2(khri brgyad): na/ sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' re re la yang bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gos dang / zas dang / mal
121b3(khri brgyad): cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing / bde ba'i yo byad thams
121b4(khri brgyad): cad kyis bkur bstir byed na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ches bsod nam sa mang du bskyed snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom
121b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ma nga lags so// dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis lag so// bcom
121b6(khri brgyad): ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la ni dpe bgyi bar yang sla ba ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de la gzugs mchi
121b7(khri brgyad): su lags na ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang mi shong bar 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chod
121b8(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor leg so legaso// rab 'byor gang khyod kyis de skad smras pa ni leg so// rab 'byor de bas rigs
122a1(khri brgyad): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba gos pa med pa'i yongasu bsngo bas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yod
122a2(khri brgyad): su bsngo bar byed pa de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba 'di ni mchog ces bya/ 
122a3(khri brgyad): rdul du byung ba zhes bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ rab ces bya/ rab mchog ces bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya/ bla na med pa zhes bya/ gong na med pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor gro
122a4(khri brgyad): bamed pas bsngo ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dad/ dag la ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des pa'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang
122a5(khri brgyad): 'phrul gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'idang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / 'grang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang mi brjod
122a6(khri brgyad): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan zhing // dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi
122a7(khri brgyad): dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi
122a8(khri brgyad): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang ldan zhing gos dang / zas dang / mal mdang / spyan dang // na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis/ 
122b1(khri brgyad): mu stang rngu byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing // bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur stir byed la/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can gang yin
122b2(khri brgyad): pa de dag la bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed pa'i phyir ro// de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi na nas/ lha'i bu nyi khras
122b3(khri brgyad): thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la
122b4(khri brgyad): mkhas pas shes pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa
122b5(khri brgyad): bde dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / ji ltar gnyis dang ga nyi su ma mchis par yang khas mi len par de ltar yongasu
122b6(khri brgyad): bsngo bar bgyid pa de ni yongasu bsngo ba chen po lags so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lhan cig tu lha'i me tog dang / 'dug pa
122b7(khri brgyad): dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gzugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dag khyer te/ lha'i sil snyan dang / 
122b8(khri brgyad): pheg rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
123a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa 'dis/ dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / gos pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma mchis
123a2(khri brgyad): nga'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / ji ltar gnyis dang gnyi su ma mchis par yang khas mi len pa de
123a3(khri brgyad): ltar yongasu bsngo bar bgyid pa de ni yongasu bsngo ba chen po lagaso// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das ga la
123a4(khri brgyad): 'der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shA
123a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas yongasu zin pa dag gong du smos pa'i byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / rigs
123a6(khri brgyad): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dmigs pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa bde dag zil gyis gnon pa de ni ngo mtshar la gso zhes sgra bsgrags shing dbyangs su brjod
123a7(khri brgyad): ro// de bzhin du tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang 'od gsal dang / dge chung
123a8(khri brgyad): dpa tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che' dang / mi che ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / rgya nom snang dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams dang
123b1(khri brgyad): lha'i rnga bye ba khrag khrig drag 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhags la mgo bos phyag
123b2(khri brgyad): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas yongasu zin pa dag gong du
123b3(khri brgyad): smos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dmigs pa la spyod pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis gnod pa ni ngo mtshar
123b4(khri brgyad): leg so zhes sgra brjod par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams/ dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu'i bar dag la bka'
123b5(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ lde'i bu dag gal te stong gsum gyi stong na po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dang / 'khod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag
123b6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur la/ de dag thams cad kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
123b7(khri brgyad): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ dam
123b8(khri brgyad): pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar deng / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang // de dgal gzhan pa'i sems
124a1(khri brgyad): can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang // bsam
124a2(khri brgyad): gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye
124a3(khri brgyad): shes mdzong ba'i phung po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dang / de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus nas dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rjes su ming rang ste/ rjes su
124a4(khri brgyad): yid rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
124a5(khri brgyad): la yang dag par zhugs te/ 'das pa dang // ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad sa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / rang sangs rgyas
124a6(khri brgyad): dang bcas pa rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar der sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ba
124a7(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus nas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul // gnyi su med pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / 
124a8(khri brgyad): gos pa med pa'i tshul dang / byed pa med pa'i tshul dang / rjesu yid rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yid rang nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar
124b1(khri brgyad): byed na sa 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni snga ma'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag pas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ snga ma'i dge ba'i
124b2(khri brgyad): rtsa ba 'di'i rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bang du yang mi bzod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsngos pa gang yin pa de ni
124b3(khri brgyad): mchog ces bya ba nas/ gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge
124b4(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rjes su yid rang ba dang / yongasu sngo ba'i bar gyi bsod nams kyi phung po gcig tu rtul nas rje su yid rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yid rang
124b5(khri brgyad): skye/ rje su yid rang bar byed pa zhes bka' stsal pa de la bcom ldan 'das rje su yid rang ba'i mchog dang / rjesu yid rang ba'i gong na ma mchis pa'i bar du ni
124b6(khri brgyad): ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gang gi tshe 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i
124b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams dang // de dag gi rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi
124b8(khri brgyad): dan pa'i rtsa ba de dag mi 'dzin mi 'dong ba'i rlom sems su mi byed cing / brnyas par yang mi byed la/ mi dmigs shing 'di snyam du 'di la chos 'ga' yang skye ba med 'gag pa
125a1(khri brgyad): med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med rnang par byang ba med la/ chos de dag ni 'grib pa yang med/ 'phel ba yang med/ 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med// pung
125a2(khri brgyad): por gyur pa yang rengad ngo // snyar du sems shing rnam grangs nges 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos de dag gi de bzhin nyid dang / mnor pa de bzhin nyid dang / gan
125a3(khri brgyad): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos mi 'gyur ba nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bdag kyang rjes su yid rang ste/ rje su yid rang nas// bla na med pa yang
125a4(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed de/ de de ltar yong su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjesu yid rang ba'i mchog tu gyur pa nas/ d+he su yid
125a5(khri brgyad): rang ba'i gong na med pa'i bar du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor rjesu yid rang ba gzhan thams cad ni rje su yid rang ba de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar
125a6(khri brgyad): du yang mi bzod do// rje su yid rang ba 'di ni rjesu yid rang ba gzhan dag pas rje su yid rang ba'i mchog ces bya ba nas// gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// ra
125a7(khri brgyad): 'byor rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa la gsang du yang dag par zhugs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
125a8(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar de dge ba'i
125b1(khri brgyad): rtsa ba smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
125b2(khri brgyad): ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i bar dang / de ma yin pa gzhan sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa
125b3(khri brgyad): bde dag thams cad la rje su yid rang bar 'dod pa des ni 'di ltar rje su yid rang ste/ rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhi du sbyin pa de yang de bzhi no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ 
125b4(khri brgyad): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyang de bzhin no// rna
125b5(khri brgyad): par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs dang // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyang de bzhin no// rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba
125b6(khri brgyad): ji lta ba bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su ma
125b7(khri brgyad): chu rtsa bdun yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
125b8(khri brgyad): chis ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin
126a1(khri brgyad): du mos pa yang de bzhin no// rjesu yid rang ba yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
126a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas
126a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongasu mya ngan las
126a4(khri brgyad): 'das pa yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin no// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de
126a5(khri brgyad): bzhin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no// rnam par grol bad+hi lA nga bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
126a6(khri brgyad): de dag gi chos nyid kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang de bzhin no// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba
126a7(khri brgyad): bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin no// zhes rje su yid rang bar bya'o// de bzhin du bcings pa med pa dang / grol ba med pa dang // kun nas nyon mongs
126a8(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i chos de dag gi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / 'byung ba med pa gang yin pa dang / 
126b1(khri brgyad): 'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyang de bzhin te/ 'pho ba med pa dang / rnam par 'jig pa med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
126b2(khri brgyad): chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rjesu yid rang ba'i mchog yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
126b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po rje su yid rang ba de dang ldan pa ni/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// rab 'byor gzhan
126b4(khri brgyad): yang phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
126b5(khri brgyad): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag
126b6(khri brgyad): la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad dang / 
126b7(khri brgyad): gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsti stang du byed bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing / 
126b8(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la nyin mtshan du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma
127a1(khri brgyad): dang / gos dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'dan dag gis bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar spro ba bskyed pa
127a2(khri brgyad): dang tshul khrims la gnas te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa dang / bzod pa bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms
127a3(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa dang / shes rab bsgom te/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom la/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
127a4(khri brgyad): byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing // tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam
127a5(khri brgyad): gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa ga nga zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
127a6(khri brgyad): chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na// bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la ni// snga ma'i bsod nams mngon par 'du/ byed pas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// 
127a7(khri brgyad): rgyu'i bang du yang mi bzod do// yongasu bsngo ba de ni mchog ces bya ba nas gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
127a8(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
127b1(khri brgyad): ba thabs la mkhas pas ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar yong su bsngo bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las// rjes su
127b2(khri brgyad): yid rang ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po che shu
127b3(khri brgyad): rtsa bdun pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'iri bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
127b4(khri brgyad): slad du snang bar bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
127b5(khri brgyad): phyag 'tshal lags// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi sa ma gos pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes pa
127b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i mun pa thams cad gsal ba'i slad du rab ring ma mchis par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
127b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi mchog tu bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jigs pa dang / khon dang // gnod pa
127b8(khri brgyad): thams cad spangs pa'i slad du bde bar bgyid la lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can rnams kyi mig lnga yongasu 'dzin pa'i srad du gas
128a1(khri brgyad): bar bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can shul ngan par zhugs pa rnams kyi mtha' rnam par spong ba'i
128a2(khri brgyad): slad du shul ston par 'gyid la lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ngag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'i sladu
128a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bgyid pa lags// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bskyed par bgyid pa'i slad du/ 
128a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po rnams kyi ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi smrad
128a5(khri brgyad): du ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa lag sa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni the ra zug tu gnas pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig pa ma mchis
128a6(khri brgyad): ba'i slong du 'khor ba'i gnyen po lags// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos rin po che thams cad stsol ba'i slad du sems can mgon ma mchis pa
128a7(khri brgyad): rnams kyi mgon bgying pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi thul ba'i slad du/ stobs bcu bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
128a8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bskor ba ma mchis pa dang / ldog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyisu bskor
128b1(khri brgyad): bar bgyid pa lags bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston par bgyid pa
128b2(khri brgyad): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gnas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar ston pa la gan
128b3(khri brgyad): par bya ba de ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// ji ltar ston pa la phyag bya ba de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la phyag bya'o// de ci'i phyir
128b4(khri brgyad): zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyang ston pa las gzhan ma yin la/ ston pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa las gzhan ma yin te/ shes rab
128b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa yin la/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
128b6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis rab tu phye ba yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
128b7(khri brgyad): dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang // phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin// dge ba
128b8(khri brgyad): bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang
129a1(khri brgyad): 'dis rab tu phye ba yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang / pha rol tu phyin pa lnga dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
129a2(khri brgyad): kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
129a3(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang 'dis rab tu phye ba yin pa'i phyir
129a4(khri brgyad): ro/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu zhu ba 'di ni ci las byung / gleng bzhi ni gang yin su mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
129a5(khri brgyad): dus lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyi yongs su rtogapa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la/ 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang khyod
129a6(khri brgyad): 'di snyam du btsun pa shA ri'i bu zhu ba 'di ni ci las byung / gleng gzhi ni gang yin snyam du rnam par rtog pa ni/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu zin
129a7(khri brgyad): ba'i byang chub sem pa sem chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed
129a8(khri brgyad): pa nas dam pa'i chos ji srid gnas pa'i bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong su bsngo bar byed do snyam du bdag gi zhu ba byung ngo // ko'u shi
129b1(khri brgyad): ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon pa yin no// de bzhin du tshul khrims
129b2(khri brgyad): dang bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zil gyis gnon par byed pa yin no// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long rnams ni brgya
129b3(khri brgyad): 'am stong ngam/ 'bum yang rung ste/ dmigs bu med na/ lam du 'jug par yang mi nus na grong khyer du phyin par ga la nus/ ko'u sha ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dmus
129b4(khri brgyad): long lta bur gyur pa 'di dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa'i dmigs bu med na byang chub kyi lam du 'jug par ma dang mi nus na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
129b5(khri brgyad): kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par lhag la nus ko'u shi / gang gi tshe rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang shes rab kyi de rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung nas// de'i
129b6(khri brgyad): tshe mig dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob po// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag kyang shes rab
129b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob po zhes zer na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'o na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
129b8(khri brgyad): yongs su bzung na/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bam/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang // bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
130a1(khri brgyad): bzung na yang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob 'am/ shA ri'i bus smras pa ko'u shi kAd+d+he lha ma yin no// de ni de lta ma yin
130a2(khri brgyad): te ko 'u shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas ni// pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob po// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa
130a3(khri brgyad): dang brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas kyang // pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob bo// ko'u shi
130a4(khri brgyad): de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po de dag gis mchog ces bya'o// phul dang / rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang
130a5(khri brgyad): bla ma med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o// de nasabacom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di/ skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
130a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji ga shes ra par 'gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
130a7(khri brgyad): pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// tsho rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
130a8(khri brgyad): pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgru
130b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgru
130b2(khri brgyad): tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub
130b3(khri brgyad): par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bang dag la mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes par kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs
130b4(khri brgyad): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub pa ra bya'o// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams
130b5(khri brgyad): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par
130b6(khri brgyad): bsgrub par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ de ltar chos de dag thams cad
130b7(khri brgyad): mngon par bsgrub tu med pa'i phyir/ shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs mngon par bsgrub tu ma
130b8(khri brgyad): mchi 'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad kyi bar dag mngon par bsgrub tu ma mchis pa'i slad du
131a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgyur par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 
131a2(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / dmig su med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// chos thams
131a3(khri brgyad): cad kyi bang dag mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / de migs su med pas shes
131a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bskrad par bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub nas/ chos gang zhig
131a5(khri brgyad): mngon par 'thob par bgyid lags/ jicom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bred ltar shes rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrubs pa na/ chos
131a6(khri brgyad): gang yang thong par mi byed de/ gang gi phyir chos gang yang thob par mi byed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// shA ri'i bus gsol
131a7(khri brgyad): ba bcom ldan 'das chos gang dag thob par mi bgyid pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu dag cha'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do// mi dge
131a8(khri brgyad): nga'i chos rnams tho bar mi byed do// de bzhin du kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na mthong med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'du byas/ 
131b1(khri brgyad): dang 'dum byas dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / bcas pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun
131b2(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed de// 'khor ba'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do// mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos rnams thob par mi byed do// 
131b3(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang la yang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de nas chos gang yang thob par mi byed// 
131b4(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
131b5(khri brgyad): nyid thob par mi bgyid lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shI ka gang yang khyod la di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ci shes rab kyi pha rol
131b6(khri brgyad): tu byin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid pa lags sam zhes zer ba ni/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol
131b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang thob par mi byed/ dmigs par mi byed pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi byed/ dmigs par mi byed do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ 
131b8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi 'gyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko ru'i
132a1(khri brgyad): ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji lta ba dang / mtshan ma ji lta ba dang / mngon par 'du bya baji ltar thod pa bya ba mi byed pa yin no// brgya byin gyis
132a2(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar thob par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka ji nas kyang khwa mi len pa dang // mi gnas pa dang / khas
132a3(khri brgyad): mi len pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / mi 'dor ba dang / mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / mi 'dzin pa dang / mi gtong ba de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad
132a4(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de// chos gang yang thob par byed pa med do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos thams/ 
132a5(khri brgyad): cang skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa// dang / mngon par 'du bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par 'jig pa
132a6(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i slad du nye bang gnas pa ni ngo mtshar lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang
132a7(khri brgyad): chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni// chos thams cad thob par bgyid pa'o// 
132a8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad thob par mi bgyid pa 'o nas bgyi 'di lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snga
132b1(khri brgyad): bar 'gyid pa lag so// de ni shes rab tu phyin pa rgyang ring du bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems
132b2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du byed pa'i rnam grangs yod de/ gal te byang chub sems dang / 
132b3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsog go// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gso
132b4(khri brgyad): dang snying po med pa dang / ya ma brla'o zhes bya bar de lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
132b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa spong bar byed pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du byed pa yin no// rab 'byor
132b6(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/ chos gang dag la yid ches par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
132b7(khri brgyad): kyis bka' sprul pa// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/ gzugs la yid mi ches so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnar dang
132b8(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa la yid mi che so// mig la yid mi che so// rnab dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la yid mi ches so// gzugs la yid mi naso// 
133a1(khri brgyad): sma dang / dri dang / rodang / reg dang / chos la yid michis so// sbyid pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yid mchi'o// nul khrims dang / brjod
133a2(khri brgyad): da brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid minus so// nang stong pa nyid la yid michis so// dngos mi med pa'i tsha ba nyid
133a3(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar la yid mi cheso// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la yid mi ches so// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
133a4(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btso ba rgyad la yid mi ches so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yid mi ches so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
133a5(khri brgyad): bu dang // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid la yid mi ches so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
133a6(khri brgyad): byang chub la yid mi ches so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid mi ches pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yid mi che so// rab 'byor gyis gso
133a7(khri brgyad): pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la glo ba ches pas// gzugs la blo ba mi ches pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
133a8(khri brgyad): dag la yang glo ba mi ches pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid
133b1(khri brgyad): mi ches so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid mi ches so// rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha
133b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pas/ gzugs la yid mi ches pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la yid mi ches pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gas
133b3(khri brgyad): pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dri ji snyam du sems
133b4(khri brgyad): rnam grangs gang gis 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di che ba yin snyam 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ongs shes rab kyi
133b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs che bar mi bgyid// chu nga bar mi bgyid/ tshor ba dang // 'du shes da nga/ 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
133b6(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyid// chung bar mi bgyid// de bzhin du khams rnams dang // skye mched rnams dang // rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba che bar mi bgyid// rung bar mi bgyi
133b7(khri brgyad): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
133b8(khri brgyad): tshobar mi 'gyid// chung bar mi bgyid// nang stong pa nyid che bar mi 'gyid// chung bar mi bgyid// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag
134a1(khri brgyad): che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi bgyid/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun che bar mi bgyid/ stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dpa
134a2(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams che bar mi bgyid// chung bar mi bgyid/ byang chub che bar mi bgyid/ rung bar mi bgyid/ 
134a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas che bar mi bgyid// chung bar mi bgyid pa lag so// gzugs sdud par mi bgyid/ 'phro bar mi bgyid/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
134a4(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdud par mi bgyid/ 'phro ba ro mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang sdud par mi bgyid// 'phro
134a5(khri brgyad): mi bgyid pa lag so// gzugs tshad ma / sa par mi 'gyid/ tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid/ rmong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
134a6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa tshad mchis par mi bgyid mamamachis pa pa'i 'gyi ba rgya / sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang tshad mchis par mi bgyid// tshad ma mchis par mi bgyid pa lag so// / 
134a7(khri brgyad): gzugs yangs par mi bgyid/ dog par mi bgyid// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yangs par mi bgyid// dog
134a8(khri brgyad): par mi bgyid/ byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du yangs par mi bgyid/ dog par mi 'gyod pa lags so// gzugs stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid
134b1(khri brgyad): stobs chung bar mi 'gyid// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/ stobs chung bar mi bgyid/ byang chub
134b2(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/ stobs chung bar mi bgyid pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
134b3(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das gal te theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
134b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol gyi na pa la yang brten/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
134b5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzug
134b6(khri brgyad): che bar mi bgyid// chung bar mi bgyid pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bar du che bar mi bgyid/ chung bar mi 'gyid pa'o// gzugs stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid/ stobs chung
134b7(khri brgyad): bar mi bgyid do zhes bgyi ba'i bang du 'du shes par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'du shes su gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi
134b8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang gzugs che ba 'am/ chung bar bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar
135a1(khri brgyad): du che ba 'am/ rung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ma lags la/ gang gzugs stobs dang ldan par bgyid pa 'am/ stobs chung
135a2(khri brgyad): bar bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du stobs dang ldan par bgying ba 'am/ stobs chung bar bgyid pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa ma lags pa'i
135a3(khri brgyad): sma ngudu'o// de ci'i smad du zhe na/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la byang chub ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// 'di ltar sems can skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du// shes
135a4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par
135a5(khri brgyad): rig par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bar du skye ba ma mchis// pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa skye ba ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems
135a6(khri brgyad): can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par bgyi'o// gzugs ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi
135a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bar du ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu zin pa ngo bo nyid ma
135a8(khri brgyad): mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems can dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs
135b1(khri brgyad): dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
135b2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bar du dngos po ma mchis
135b3(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems can stong pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong par rig par
135b4(khri brgyad): bgyi'o// gzugs stong pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong par rig par bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
135b5(khri brgyad): pa stong pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong / par rig par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bar du stong pa 'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
135b6(khri brgyad): stong par rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin du sems can mtshan ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang
135b7(khri brgyad): smod pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa
135b8(khri brgyad): dang / smon pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma
136a1(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa mtshan ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis par rig par 'gyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bar du mtshan ma mams
136a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin du sems can dben pa dang / 
136a3(khri brgyad): sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i slad du// shes
136a4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par ri ga bar bgyi'o// sems can rnam par bshig pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin rnam par
136a5(khri brgyad): bshig pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba mam chis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon
136a6(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon
136a7(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis pa'i
136a8(khri brgyad): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis pa'i
136b1(khri brgyad): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems can stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du// shes rab kyi bol tu phyin pa stobs dang
136b2(khri brgyad): mi ldan par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par rig par bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
136b3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par rig par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bar du stobs dang mi ldan pa'i slad
136b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stobs dang mi ldan par rig par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des kyang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
136b5(khri brgyad): chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lagaso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ mngon par bsgrub pa'i yon tan
136b6(khri brgyad): yang dag par bsngags pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol no// 
136b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos pa de gang nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir mchis pa lags/ rigs kyi bu
136b8(khri brgyad): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang tshul las mos pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas ni/ ji srid cig lags
137a1(khri brgyad): de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la ni bsnyen bkur bgyis pa lags/ des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
137a2(khri brgyad): byin pa la spyad nas ni ji srid cig lags/ des tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad nas ni ji srid cig lags
137a3(khri brgyad): des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad nas ni ji srid cig lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
137a4(khri brgyad): to/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen bo dI ni/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
137a5(khri brgyad): la bsnyen bkur byas nas 'dir 'ongs shing 'dir skyes pa yin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
137a6(khri brgyad): drag 'bum phrag grangs med tshad med pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa yin no// de nas sems dang po bskyed pa phyin cad nas sbyin pa'i
137a7(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing // tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam btan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad nas 'dir skyes pa yin// de tshun
137a8(khri brgyad): tshad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med tshad med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab// gzhol du med pa dog la/ bsnyen bkur byas
137b1(khri brgyad): shing 'dir 'ongs pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ngam thos na yang / 'di snyam du bdag gis ston pa mam
137b2(khri brgyad): snyam du sems skye bar 'gyur zhing / bdag gis ston pa thos snyam pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni mtshan ma med pa dang / ga
137b3(khri brgyad): su med pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang tshul dang ldan pas khong du chud par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
137b4(khri brgyad): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa blta ba 'am/ mnyan par nus lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
137b5(khri brgyad): ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor chos bems po ti phyed/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa blta ba po dang / nyan pa po ni ming pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mthong mi
137b6(khri brgyad): thos/ de bzhin du chos bems po nyid kyi phyir/ bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi mthong mi tho so// chos bems
137b7(khri brgyad): po nyid kyi phyir/ des nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag mi mthong mi thos so// de bzhin du chos bems po nyid kyi phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam
137b8(khri brgyad): mi mthong mi thos// chos bems po nyid kyi phyir/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
138a1(khri brgyad): / rnams dang / lam mi mthong mi thos so// chos bems po nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
138a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi mthong mi thos// chos bems pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub mi mthong mi mtho so// sangs rgyas mi mthong mi thos// de nas bcom ldan 'das
138a3(khri brgyad): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal
138a4(khri brgyad): 'byor du bgyid pa des yun ji srid cig nas spyad pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni rnam par dbye zhing bshad dgos te/ rab 'byor
138a5(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang / po bskyed phyin chad nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du byed cing / de bzhin du
138a6(khri brgyad): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smyon pa'i pha rol tu phyi
138a7(khri brgyad): pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de yang thabs la mkhas pas rnal 'byor du byed cing / chos 'ga' yang spong bar mi byed la ji ltar 'bel ba dang / 'o grib par mi mthong
138a8(khri brgyad): bas nam du yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la/ mchod pa'i khyad par gang dag gis/ sa
138b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par de dag des sems bskyed ma thag tu 'gru
138b2(khri brgyad): par 'gyur zhing / sa ng+yas kyi zhing nas sang+yas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// nang du yang ma'i mngal du yang skye bar mi 'gyuraro// nam du yang mngon par shes pa rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ 
138b3(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa gang dang yang 'grogs par mi 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sang+yas kyi sems dang / yang 'grogs par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams kyang yong su smin par
138b4(khri brgyad): par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yong su dag par byed cing // sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sang+yas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / rab 'a byod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
138b5(khri brgyad): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis
138b6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang / sang+yas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag mthong bar 'gyur la/ de dag gi drud na slob pa'i tshe dmigs
138b7(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab bsgoms pa dag yod de/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
138b8(khri brgyad): phyin pa zab mo 'ong ston pa/ 'khor de nas 'gro bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na gus pa med pas/ sa d+ya
139a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung nas 'gro bar 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thag pa chen po pa de dag ni 'di nyid du yang 'dus te gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
139a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na 'gro bar byed pa dag yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan
139a3(khri brgyad): ba na phyir song bar gyur la/ da ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za' mo 'di ston pa na yang de dag phyir 'gro ba byed cing/ lus dang sems kyis tshogs par mi byed pas/ de dag shes rab
139a4(khri brgyad): 'chal par 'gyur ba'i la sogs te/ de dag gis shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa
139a5(khri brgyad): na spong bar 'gyu po// de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa
139a6(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang spangs par 'gyur la/ de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs pa las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba byas shing bsags pa dang chos
139a7(khri brgyad): kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des/ lo mang po dang / lo brgya drag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo 'bum drag mang po dang ga lo byed pa
139a8(khri brgyad): khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po'i bar du sems can dmyal ba rnams su bsreg par 'gyuraro// de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen
139b1(khri brgyad): po rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing // de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnam su 'gro ba na/ mes yong su 'jig pa 'am// nus yongasu 'jig pa 'am/ rlung gis 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 
139b2(khri brgyad): de dag der 'jig pa dag 'byung ba na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan de dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams gang yin pa de dag tu 'phen par 'gyur// de dag der skyes nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen
139b3(khri brgyad): po rnams nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po rnamasu 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po rnam su 'gro ste/ yang 'jig pa 'byung ba na de dag 'jig
139b4(khri brgyad): rten gyi khams de dag nas 'jig rten gyi gzhan dag tu 'phen par 'gyuraro// de dag tu yang gang gi tshe 'jig pa byung na/ de dag shar phyogasu 'phen par 'gyuraro// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtshams dang
139b5(khri brgyad): 'og dang steng gi phyogs rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su 'phen par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu yang 'a jig pa byung ba na// de dag 'jig rten gyi khams bzhan dag gi
139b6(khri brgyad): sems can dmyal ba chen po rnamasu 'phen par 'gyur// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu yang 'jig pa byung ba na/ chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las ma zad pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag
139b7(khri brgyad): nas shi 'phos nas yang 'di nyid du yang skye bar 'gyur zhing / de dag yang sems can dmyal ba rnams nas/ sems can dmyal ba rnamasu 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po rnamasu skyes pa
139b8(khri brgyad): na yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams nyam su myong bar 'gyur zhing / ji srid du 'jig pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de srid du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams nyam su myong bar
140a1(khri brgyad): 'gyuraro// 'jig pa byung ba na yang 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal ba chen po rnamasu skye bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du yang nas yang du phyogs bcu kun
