140a2(khri brgyad): kyi dung 'gro'i skye gnas rnamasu yang skye ba 'gyur/ yang dang rang du phyogs bcu kun gyig shin rje'i 'jig rten rnamasu yang skye bar 'gyur // de dag tu skyes nas kyang sdug bsngal gyi tshor bdag phying po
140a3(khri brgyad): las zad par byed par 'gyuraro// de dag gis sdug bsngal mang po de dag myong bas las zad par byas nas/ ji ste brgya la mi skye bo thob par gyur na yang / chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing
140a4(khri brgyad): bsags pa de nyid kyis de dag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang deng / dmus long gi khyim rnamasu skye bar 'gyuraro// gdol pa'i khyib rnams sam/ g.yung po'i khyim rnams sam/ ma rabs kyi
140a5(khri brgyad): khyim rnam su skye bar 'gyur/ de dag tu skyes na yang ling brda masu 'gyur ba 'am// zhang ba rnams sa/ lce med pa rnams sam/ lag pa med pa rnams sam/ rkang pa med pa rnams sas
140a6(khri brgyad): rnab med pa rnams sam/ sAmed pa rnams som/ gang nasangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par ma 'gyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang / rang sa rgyas kyi sgra thos
140a7(khri brgyad): par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur skye bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtsham ma mchis pa lnga po dag ni chos kyi phongs par 'gyur
140a8(khri brgyad): nga'i sug las bgyis shing bsags pa de'i 'ol du yang mi mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stod pa na bzlog par sems
140b1(khri brgyad): shing de dag la 'di skad du 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin/ 'di ni ston pa'i bka' ma yin/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma yin/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
140b2(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas rnams kyis ma gsungs// mi gsung gargyanami 'gyur ba yin gyis 'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes zer zhing // de bdag gis kyang bzlog par bya'o// snyam du sems la sem
140b3(khri brgyad): can gzhan dag kyang 'bral bar 'gyur bar byed de/ de rang gi sems kyi rgyud la yang gnod pa byas nas/ gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la yang gnod par bya ba sems/ de rang gi sems kyi rgyud kyang dug
140b4(khri brgyad): rang bcas par byas nas/ gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud kyang dug dang bcas par byed par 'gyur// de bdag kyang de chud gsan cing gzhan yang chud gson par 'dod pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
140b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa zab mo ma rtogs shing / mi shes pas bzlog par sems la/ gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du 'dzin par byed par 'a rgyu bar byed pas na/ chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las
140b6(khri brgyad): byas shing bsags pa de'i 'ol tu yang mi 'ong ngo zhes brjod par bya ste/ shA ri'i bungs ni gang zag de lta bu dag thos par bya bar yang ma gnang na blta ba lta ci smos te/ gan su ltag la rung / de ci'i phyir zhe
140b7(khri brgyad): na shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag ni chosu na 'byin pa yin par rig par bya zhing / shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu dag ni shing rul ba lta bu dang / nag po'i rang bzhin can yin par rig par bya ba'i
140b8(khri brgyad): phyir ro// shA ri'i bu gang dag gang de lta bu de dag la dad cing mnyan par sems pa de dag kyang tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu gang nga'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sun 'byin
141a1(khri brgyad): pa'i gang zag de lta bu ni chos sun 'byin par rig par byed do// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos sun 'byin par bgyid pa'i gang zag der skyes
141a2(khri brgyad): nga'i lus kyi tshad ni bka' ma stsal lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos sun 'byin par byed pa'i gang zag der skyes pa de'i lus kyi mang ni zhog shig/ de ci'i byin/ cho
141a3(khri brgyad): 'byin du byed pa'i gang zag de'i lus kyi rang thos na ji tsam du chos sun 'byin par byed pa'i gang zag ngo'i lus thob pa'i chang ni de 'dra stid de 'dra ba'i skyon yod do zhes kha nas khrag dron po sgyur
141a4(khri brgyad): par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ shi la thug pa'i sdug bsngal bur gyur ba'am/ de thos na mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang lba na pa 'am/ 'dam bu sngon po brngas pa ltar skam zhing rnas
141a5(khri brgyad): 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri bu la de'i lus kyi tshad ni 'di tsam du 'gyur zhes skabs dbye ba ma mdzad do// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi
141a6(khri brgyad): 'ongs par 'gyur ba'i las bgyis shing / bsags pa des chos sun 'byin par bgyid pa'i gang zag rnams de lta bu'i lus kyi las yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes slang ma'i skye bo rnams la snang bar bgyi
141a7(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur lags na bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsoso/ com ldan 'das kyis bkar dul de/ shA ri'i du de ni chos kyis 'ongs par 'gyur ba'i las rdzogs par byis shing bas gis pa des
141a8(khri brgyad): de srid du sems can dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal de'i tshad ming / mnga' dang / yun srid du sdug bsngal myong bar byung zhes bya ba de'id kyang phyi mi'i skye bo rnams la snang bar byas par 'gyur
141b1(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyis dkar po'i rang bzhin can gyi rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos kyis longs par 'gyur ba'i sug las de dag las ldog par 'gyur te/ bdag cag
141b2(khri brgyad): kyang sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag dang phrang du 'ong ngo zhes de dag srog gi slad du yang dam pa'i chos spong bar mi 'gyid lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
141b3(khri brgyad): mam ldan 'as dang pa'i chos spong ba'i ngag gi las bgyis shing bsags pa des ni chos kyis yongs par 'gyur ba'i mug las 'byid ci sog par 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan
141b4(khri brgyad): 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos bdag cag sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag dang phrang dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngam/ chos mi thos sam/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur mi byed dam/ sa ng+yas 'byung
141b5(khri brgyad): bzed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ring rnam su skye ba'ang/ mi dkyil po rnams su skyeb 'am/ tshig gzung bar mi 'os par gyur na mi cho// zhes lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams legs
141b6(khri brgyad): gdams par bgyi lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mi blungan po gang dag legs par gsung ba'i 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
141b7(khri brgyad): 'di la su dbyung bar bya'o// snyam du sems pa de dag ni ngag gi las byas shing bsags pa des chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las byed tshing sogs par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor shes
141b8(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sun dbyung 'a byas shing / bzlog pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la sun dbyung bar byas shing rlog pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'as rnams
142a1(khri brgyad): / kyi byang chub la sun dbyung ba byas shing / bzlog pas ni 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad ma khyedan pa nyid
142a2(khri brgyad): sum byung ba byas shing bzlog pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sun dbyung ba byas shing bzlug pas ni/ chos bzlog pa yin no// chos bzlog pas ni dge 'dun bzlog pa yin no// ge
142a3(khri brgyad): 'dun zlog pas ni/ 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das par yang dag pa'i lta ba bzlog pa yin no// de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su
142a4(khri brgyad): bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag bzlog
142a5(khri brgyad): pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bzlog pas/ bsod na/ mas ma yin pa'i phung po tshad med/ grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongasu 'azung ba yin no// bsod nams ma yin pa'i
142a6(khri brgyad): phung po yongs bzung ba des sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba chad me dgrangs med/ dngag tu med bdag kyang yong su bzung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi blun po ga
142a7(khri brgyad): dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bzlog par bgyid pa de dag rnam pa du zhi ga gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zag mo di bzlog par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
142a8(khri brgyad): ngag stsal pag pa 'byo mo blun po dag ni rnam pa bzhis shes rab gyi rol tu byin pa rnam mo 'di zlog pa byid can ga nam 'dis ste/  rlung po dadag 'drad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa
142b1(khri brgyad): chos zab mo rnams la mos par mi byed cing / dad pa mi rnyed pa dang / de dag gi sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bas/ phung po lnga la mngon par bzhen par 'gyur ba dang / mi blun po de dag nyes pa
142b2(khri brgyad): spyod cing / bdag la bstod pa dang / gzhan la smod pa yin te/ rab 'byor mi blun po de dag ni rnam pa de bzhi dang ldan pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzlog par byed pa yin
142b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs pa'i sug par michis pa dag gis
142b4(khri brgyad): mos par bka' ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me ni mngon pa mi brtson pa rnams dang / 
142b5(khri brgyad): dge ba'i rtsa ba med pa rnams dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba rnams kyis mos par bka' ba yin no// rab 'byor/ gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar mos pa
142b6(khri brgyad): dka' ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ji tsam du zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs dngos
142b7(khri brgyad): po med pa'i rang bzhin ni gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir na/ 
142b8(khri brgyad): par shes pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi
143a1(khri brgyad): pa dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'dron
143a2(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med
143a3(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhin ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni nang
143a4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar nim bcings ma grol ba'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos
143a5(khri brgyad): po med pa'i rang bzhin ni// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid so nga pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gan/ ga pa rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
143a6(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dang pa dang / dbang
143a7(khri brgyad): po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lan// rnams ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni lam yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin
143a8(khri brgyad): du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'aco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 
143b1(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' nim bcings ma grol b.lo/ 
143b2(khri brgyad): / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhir ni gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam pa
143b3(khri brgyad): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngor gyi mtha' ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi mtha' dngos po med pa'i rang bzhi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyira'o// rab 'byor gzugs
143b4(khri brgyad): kyi phyi ma'i mtha' nim bcings ma grol ba'o//  ci'i phyi me na/ phyi ma'i mthar dngas po med pa'i rang bzhin ni// gzugs yin pa'i phyi'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor bdang / 'du shes
143b5(khri brgyad): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyi ma'i mtha' ni mang cings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi ma'i mtha' das
143b6(khri brgyad): po me pa'i rang bzhin ni// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs da ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ltar byung ba'i dngos po med
143b7(khri brgyad): pa'i rang bzhi ni/ gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi b.rang
143b8(khri brgyad): ltar byung ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ltar byung ba dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyi gsol pa/ 
144a1(khri brgyad): // bcom ldan 'das shes rab kying rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi 'artson pa rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrud pa rnams dang / sdig pa'i grogs pa'i mug par mchis pa rnams dang
144a2(khri brgyad): bdud kyi dbang du mchis pa rnams dang / le lo can rnams dang / brtsod 'grus zhan pa rnams dang / snyung ngas pa rdzabs dang / shes bzhin can ma lags pa rnams kyis mos par dka' nga lag so// bco
144a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ mngon par mi brtson pa rnams dang / shes bzhin can ma yin pa'i bar
144a4(khri brgyad): dag gis mos par bka' ba yin// rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa nyid do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
144a5(khri brgyad): par shes pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'bras du rnam par dag pa nyid do// rnang pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni// 'bras
144a6(khri brgyad): bu rnam par dag pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// // bang po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang
144a7(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni/ 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// 'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag
144a8(khri brgyad): nga gang yin 'di ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o// 'bras bu rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes
144b1(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs rnam pa
144b2(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di dag ni gnyis su med de gnyi su dbyer med cing / tha mi dang de gcad
144b3(khri brgyad): du med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni
144b4(khri brgyad): gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
144b5(khri brgyad): pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na ga zugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
144b6(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med/ gnyi su dbyer med cing / tha mi dad de gcad du med do// rab 'byor gzhan
144b7(khri brgyad): yang bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na bdag rnam par dag pa dang / 
144b8(khri brgyad): gzugs rnam par dag pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med/ gnyisu dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gan du med do// sems can dang / srog dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du rnam par dag
145a1(khri brgyad): pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du na
145a2(khri brgyad): par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyisu dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dod chags rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa dang
145a3(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na 'dod chags rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
145a4(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyi su dbyed me da cing tha mi dang de gcad du med do// de bzhin du zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs rnam par
145a5(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dgra pa ste/ de ltar na zhe sdang dang gti mu ga rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam
145a6(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su med de gnyi su dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang
145a7(khri brgyad): dang gti mug rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par dag pa dang
145a8(khri brgyad): gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad// khye pa nyid kyi nga du rnam par dag pa 'dzini gnyis su dbyed med cing tha mi dang gcang ngu do// ba bying gzhan yang ma rig pa rnam par
145b1(khri brgyad): dgabs/ 'du byed rnam par dag pa/ 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o// de bzhin du ring dang gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// skye mched drug rnam par dag pa'o// reg pa rnam par
145b2(khri brgyad): dag pa'o// tshor ba rnam par dag pa'o// sred pa rnam par dag pa'o// len pa rnam par dag pa'o// srid pa rnam par dag pa'o// skye ba rnam par dag pa'o// / skye ba rnam par dag pas/ rga shi
145b3(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'o// rga shi rnam par dag pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// tshul khrim
145b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas// bzod par pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// brtson
145b5(khri brgyad): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ bsam pa tar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// bsam gta na gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
145b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas/ nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
145b7(khri brgyad): du rnam par dag pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par dag pa'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
145b8(khri brgyad): nang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnam par dag pas thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid
146a1(khri brgyad): / rnam par dag pas/ stobs bcu rnam par dag pa'o// stobs bcu rnam par dag pas/ mi 'jigs pa rnam pa dag pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas
146a2(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thaMd mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na rnam pa tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas
146a3(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su med de/ gnyisu dbyer med cing tha mi dang de gcad du ma'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs
146a4(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa tha~Mng mkhyed pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltalta na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par
146a5(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su med me/ gnyis su dbyer med cing tha mi dang de gcad du med do// de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha
146a6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi na pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par
146a7(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa
146a8(khri brgyad): ste de ltar na spyodan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid kyi bar durnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su med de gnyi sa dbyer med cing tha mi
146b1(khri brgyad): dang de gcad du medo// nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o// byang chub kyi phyog
146b2(khri brgyad): kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o// stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
146b3(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid
146b4(khri brgyad): thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
146b5(khri brgyad): pa rnams rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye na ba nyid rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su med/ gnyis dbyer med tsang tha mi dad de gcad du med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dus byas rnam
146b6(khri brgyad): par dag pas/ 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa'o// 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na 'dus byas rnam par dag pa
146b7(khri brgyad): dang / 'dus ma byas rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su med de/ gnyi su dbyer med cing / tha mi dad de gcad du med do// rab 'a
146b8(khri brgyad): gzhan yang 'das pa rnam par dag pas/ ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o// ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/ 'das pa rnam par dag pa'o// da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pas/ 'das
146'a1(khri brgyad): / pa dang ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa'o// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pas/ da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na 'das pa rnam par dag
146'a2(khri brgyad): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa rnam par dag pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa 'di ni gnyi su med med de gnyisu dbyer med cing tha mi dad de gcad du medo// // shes rab kyi pha
146'a3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ sems can dmyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum bcu rtsa lnga'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
146'a4(khri brgyad): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa 'di ni zab pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
146'a5(khri brgyad): phyir zab bo// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du zab pa lags/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzug
146'a6(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i byir zab pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin// sa'i khams dang / tshu'i khams dang / me'i lam
146'a7(khri brgyad): dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin// mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid shin tu rnam par
146'a8(khri brgyad): dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang // ro dang / reg bya dang / chos shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag
146'b1(khri brgyad): ba'i phyir zad pa yin no// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no// nang
146'b2(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag
146'b3(khri brgyad): pa rnams shin tu rnam pa dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 
146'b4(khri brgyad): lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zadab pa yin no// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sang+yas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
146'b5(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin no// byang chub shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir zab pa yin// 
146'b6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni snang ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni
146'b7(khri brgyad): snang ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs shin
146'b8(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i phyi rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam pa dag pa ni snang ba yin// mig shin tu rnam par
147a1(khri brgyad): // dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// gzugs dang / sgra dang / 
147a2(khri brgyad): dri dang / ro dang / reb bya dang / chos shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang
147a3(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i khams shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// chul
147a4(khri brgyad): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir// rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// nang stong pa nyid
147a5(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// dang sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba
147a6(khri brgyad): yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan/ 
147a7(khri brgyad): lag dang / lam shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang // sang+yas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam
147a8(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yino// rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni snang ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa// bcom
147b1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni nying mtshams spyong ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
147b2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das gang nying mtshams sbyor ba ma mchis pas/ rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs 'pho ba med pas/ nying mtshams spor ba med pa ni rtswa
147b3(khri brgyad): par dag pa yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'pho ba med pas/ nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
147b4(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dge pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ 
147b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pas rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis
147b6(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa yino// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/ rang bzhin gyis ku na nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag
147b7(khri brgyad): pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
147b8(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi 'o/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ rnam par dag pa lags
148a1(khri brgyad): // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs la thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phreng rnam par dag pa yin no// ma pa thams cad
148a2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thob pa med pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni mngon par
148a3(khri brgyad): ma grub pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par grub pa ma
148a4(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i slad du/ rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs mngon pa ra grub pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa yin// 
148a5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni 'dod
148a6(khri brgyad): pa'i khamasu mi skye lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ rnam par dag
148a7(khri brgyad): pa 'dod pa'i kham su mi skye ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dmigasu med pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa mi skye'o// shA ri'i
148a8(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs kyi khamasu mi skye ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag
148b1(khri brgyad): phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pa gzugs kyi khamasu mi skye ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs
148b2(khri brgyad): kyi rang bzhin dmigasu med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa mi skye'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldam 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs ma mchis pa'i khams su mi skye ba
148b3(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pa gzugs ma
148b4(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i khamasu mi skye ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i khams kyis rang bzhin dmigasu med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pa mi
148b5(khri brgyad): skye'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dang / pa ni 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam
148b6(khri brgyad): por dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa ji ltar na rnam par dag pa 'tshal ba ma mchis pa lag// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri
148b7(khri brgyad): bu chos bems po nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par dag pa ni shes pa med pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa ni gzugs ma 'tshal ba lags so// bcim
148b8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ rnam par dag pas gzugs ma 'tshal ba lags/ 
149a1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par dag pas gzugs mi she so// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
149a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin du rnam par dag pa ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam pa
149a3(khri brgyad): dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal ba lags/ btso
149a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid s+ho/ nga pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par dag pas/ tshor ba dang / 'dzin sa dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi
149a5(khri brgyad): neso// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag ni chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu
149a6(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pas/ chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
149a7(khri brgyad): pa shA ri'i bu chos thams cad dmigasu med pa'i phyir/ rnam par dag pas chos thams cad mi sheso// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
149a8(khri brgyad): ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang phan par mi bgyid// gnod par yang mi bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ri'i bu shin tu
149b1(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i byi'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par mi bgyid/ gnod
149b2(khri brgyad): par yang mi bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA yi chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
149b3(khri brgyad): pa nyid la phan par yang mi byed/ gnod par yang mi byed// shA ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni/ chos gang yang yongasu 'dzin
149b4(khri brgyad): par mi bgyid lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ shes rab
149b5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas chos gang yang yongasu 'dzin par mi bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos kyi dbyings
149b6(khri brgyad): mi g.yo ba nyid kyis phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshad nga ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//  com ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i sra
149b7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag
149b8(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pas/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdag med pa'i phyir/ gzugs shin du rnam par dag
150a1(khri brgyad): pa yin no// nga 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i spyang du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam pa
150a2(khri brgyad): ngan pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyi mo// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam
150a3(khri brgyad): par dag ngas// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
150a4(khri brgyad): bdag med pa'i phyir/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed// mas dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med pa shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol
150a5(khri brgyad): dang bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i sladadu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa rnam par dag pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad// tshul
150a6(khri brgyad): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus thamam gtan dang / rishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa las so// bcom ldan 'das 'dag rnam par dag pa'i sla
150a7(khri brgyad): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par dag pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po
150a8(khri brgyad): dang / stobs/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnam par dag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag rno bar dag pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
150b1(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa rnams rnam pa
150b2(khri brgyad): dag pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag
150b3(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdag med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi
150b4(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par
150b5(khri brgyad): dag pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bra sa bu dang // phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
150b6(khri brgyad): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'a byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// 
150b7(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
150b8(khri brgyad): bu rnam par dag pa dang / bdag rnam par dag pas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par dang
151a1(khri brgyad): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam
151a2(khri brgyad): par dag pa'i slad du/ byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
151a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ci'i slad bdag rnam par dag pa'i// byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// 
151a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i smra bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
151a5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rangab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad
151a6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga/ rab 'byor shes pa ma rnyed pa ma stong pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyi sa gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnyi su ma mchis shing / 
151a7(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa ni thob pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
151a8(khri brgyad): ci'i slad du/ gnyi su ma mchis shing rnam par dag pa thob pa mamachis pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par bya
151b1(khri brgyad): ba med pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du// gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
151b2(khri brgyad): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas/ gzugs kun du mtha' yas shing rnam par dag pa lags/ 
151b3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
151b4(khri brgyad): 'das bdag kun du mtha' yas pa'i slad/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
151b5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'a ngas ci'i slad du/ bdag kun du mtha' yas
151b6(khri brgyad): pas/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun du mtha' yas shing rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
151b7(khri brgyad): mthar las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de ni/ byang chub
151b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
152a1(khri brgyad): / gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de ltar rtogs pa gang lags pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a
152a2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
152a3(khri brgyad): po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol gyi 'gram 'am/  rol gyi 'gram 'am/ gnyi ga ma mchis pas mi dmigs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
152a4(khri brgyad): pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
152a5(khri brgyad): chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol gyi 'gram 'am/ pha rol gyi 'gram 'am/ gnyi ga ma mchis pa la yang mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan
152a6(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
152a7(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar dmigs pa'i tshul gyi 'du shes su bgyid na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
152a8(khri brgyad): gsog tu 'gyid pa lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyang ring du bgying pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs leg so// 
152b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor de de bzhino// de de bzhin to// ming du yang chags/ mtshan mar yang chags ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/ ming med pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
152b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ ming du yang chags pa lags/ mtshan mar yang chags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la theg pa chen po
152b3(khri brgyad): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ming du yang 'dzin par byed/ mtshan mar yang 'dzin par byed cing / ming dang mtshan mar gzung nas/ 
152b4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su byed de/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom semasu byed pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du
152b5(khri brgyad): byed pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
152b6(khri brgyad): dang chags pa dang / ma chags pa 'di dag legs par bshad cing / shin tu mthar gtugs pa ni ngo mtshar lagaso// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i byas/ tshe dang ldan
152b7(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ches smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa ni gang yin/ ma chags
152b8(khri brgyad): pa ni gang yin / rab 'byor gyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu me thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs stong zhes
153a1(khri brgyad): / bya byar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya ba 'du shes na chags pa yin no// khams rnam
153a2(khri brgyad): dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// de bzhin du tshul
153a3(khri brgyad): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
153a4(khri brgyad): stong ngo zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags ba yin no// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdza 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang // dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan
153a5(khri brgyad): lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
153a6(khri brgyad): du stong zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no//  dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pas/ 'das pa'i
153a7(khri brgyad): chos rnams la 'das pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams
153a8(khri brgyad): la da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sems dang / 
153b1(khri brgyad): 'obaskyed byin chad dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa yin no// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / 
153b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub
153b3(khri brgyad): kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la spyod na chags pa yin no// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / 
153b4(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyo don chags pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha
153b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma chags pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa shes rab
153b6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ 'di snyam du gzugs kyis gzugs kun du mi shes// rab dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas
153b7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa kun du mi she so// 'das pa'i chos rnams kyis/ 'das pa'i chos rnams kun du mi sheso// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyis/ mi 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kun du mi
153b8(khri brgyad): sheso// da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun du mi shes snyam du mi sem so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la
154a1(khri brgyad): / mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong
154a2(khri brgyad): ba nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / 
154a3(khri brgyad): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dong ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi
154a4(khri brgyad): dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med ba stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin
154a5(khri brgyad): pa sbyin par bya'o// 'di la sbyin par bya'o// 'di sbyin par bya'o zhe'am/ de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes ra
154a6(khri brgyad): bsgom par bya'o// shes ro ba 'di bsgom par bya'o// shes rab 'di ltar bsgom par bya'o zhe 'am/ bdag gis bsod nams spel bar bya'o// bsod nams 'di spel bar bya'o// bsod
154a7(khri brgyad): rnams 'di ltar spel bar bya'o/ zhe'am/ bdag ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed pa'o// bdag ni sems can
154a8(khri brgyad): yong su smin par byed pa'o// bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rje su thob par byed pa'o snyam du mi sems te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
154b1(khri brgyad): chen 'thabs la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya ka la ni/ de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa dag med do//  dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
154b2(khri brgyad): chen po thabs la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma chags pa yin no// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// 
154b3(khri brgyad): btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chags par 'gyur ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems
154b4(khri brgyad): dmas sems su kun shes pa dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes 'i kun du shes pa dang / nang stong pa nyid
154b5(khri brgyad): tu shes pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nya da stong pa nyid kyi bar du kun du shes pa dang / stobs pa cu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
154b6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su kun du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamasu kun du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas las bskyed
154b7(khri brgyad): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnamasu kun du shes pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/ brtul cing gzhal ba nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
154b8(khri brgyad): bsngo bar byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chags pa ste/ des ni chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhen
155a1(khri brgyad): / nad ko ru shi kA 'di lhung gzugs kyi rang 'azhin ni yongasu bsngo bar mi nus la/ ko'u shi ga tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
155a2(khri brgyad): bzhir yang yongasasu bsngo bar mi nus shing / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rang bzhin yang yong su bsngo bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang dran
155a3(khri brgyad): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzhan dag la ston par 'dod pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'drug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
155a4(khri brgyad): chen pos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i yid kyis yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya// yang dag par gzeng bstod par
155a5(khri brgyad): bya yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ci nas kyang bdang / ni sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o// bdag ni tshul khrims bsrung ba'o// 
155a6(khri brgyad): bdag ni bzod pa bsgom pa'o// bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o// bdag ni bosam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'o// bdag ni shes rab bsgom pa'o// bdag ni nang stong pa nyid
155a7(khri brgyad): la spyod pa'o// bdag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'o// bdag ni byang chub kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bsgom pa'o// bdag ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'o// 
155a8(khri brgyad): snyam du rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / de ltar gzhan dag la yang dag par ston pa da
155b1(khri brgyad): yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa de ni / bdag kyang nyams par mi 'gyur la/ de dag la yang sadus kyis gnang ba yang
155b2(khri brgyad): dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya/ 
155b3(khri brgyad): yang dag par gzeng stod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ste/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dgis de ltar chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongasu spang
155b4(khri brgyad): bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor gang khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la
155b5(khri brgyad): chags pa'i mtha' de dag bstan pa ni legaso// leg so// rab 'byor chags pa'i rnam pa de bos kyang phra ba gzhan dag kyang khyod la bstan par byas/ de dag legs pa
155b6(khri brgyad): rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis pa com ldam 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das
155b7(khri brgyad): kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs
155b8(khri brgyad): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan mar yid la byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa
156a1(khri brgyad): / yin no// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
156a2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas shing / phung po'i lhag med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas/ ji srid dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa
156a3(khri brgyad): de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing / yid la byas nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la
156a4(khri brgyad): byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa chags pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa deg dang // de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge
156a5(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang mtshan mar yid la byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yong su bsngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la
156a6(khri brgyad): byed pa de tsam du chags pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin la/ de dag las gzhan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
156a7(khri brgyad): ba dag kyang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin pa'i phyiraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'od skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
156a8(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni zab pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
156b1(khri brgyad): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byas shing / 
156b2(khri brgyad): mngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste/ nga ni sus kyang mngon par rtogs par mi nu so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par da / 
156b3(khri brgyad): ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su ma yin te/ gcig du zad do// rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang
156b4(khri brgyad): yin pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no// gang rang ba ni/ ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de ni ma ngon par 'dus ma byas pa ste// rab 'byong byang chub sems da
156b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen pos de ltar rang bzhin gcig pa dang / rang bzhin ma yin pa dang / ma byas pa dang / mdze na par 'dus ma byas par shes na/ chags pa'i mtha' thams
156b6(khri brgyad): cad yongasu spangs pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
156b7(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma thos shing / bye brag ma phyed de/ rnam par ma shes la/ mngon par rdzogs par khong du ma chud pa yin// 
156b8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes ra
157a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang mi shes pa ste/ gzugs kyis mi sheso// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pas mi shes so// 'am
157a2(khri brgyad): dang / skye meched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams kyis mi she so// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis mi sheso// 
157a3(khri brgyad): stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis mi sheso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
157a4(khri brgyad): khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang
157a5(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gyid pa po ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
157a6(khri brgyad): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos tham sa cad dmigasu med par byed pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
157a7(khri brgyad): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
157a8(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te ba rgyangs la mi spyod na shes rab kyi phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gol te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
157b1(khri brgyad): dang rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams dang // skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
157b2(khri brgyad): brnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang das
157b3(khri brgyad): par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos madres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// 
157b4(khri brgyad): gal te gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhe
157b5(khri brgyad): bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du
157b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / maM rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal
157b7(khri brgyad): zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
157b8(khri brgyad): rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa'am mo sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med la/ gang rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ 
158a1(khri brgyad): / bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'ang/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'ang/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dun pa sa par shes pa yang med cing / de bzhin
158a2(khri brgyad): rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang med pa'i phyi ro// 
158a3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems de pa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te gzugs yongasu rdzogs pa 'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa zhes bya bar
158a4(khri brgyad): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu rdzogs pa 'am/ yongs su ma rdzogs pa
158a5(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nin mo// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ra du yong su rdzogs pa/ yongasu ma rdzogs pa zhes bya ba
158a6(khri brgyad): mi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yong su rdzogs pa 'am yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi
158a7(khri brgyad): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin la/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu rdzogs pa 'am// yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang
158a8(khri brgyad): mon bde rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin zhing // de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyi bar du yongasu
158b1(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa 'am yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i
158b2(khri brgyad): phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chags pa dang // chags pa ma mchis
158b3(khri brgyad): pa gang lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la legs par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis
158b4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
158b5(khri brgyad): po rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa dag legs par bsha da do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa
158b6(khri brgyad): la spyod pa/ gzugs chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
158b7(khri brgyad): chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi bskyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// mig chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// 
158b8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med pa zhes bya
159a1(khri brgyad): / bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
159a2(khri brgyad): chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / 
159a3(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// rab 'byor
159a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na gzugs na gas pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
159a5(khri brgyad): shes pa chags pa med pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa mdo// rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa med pa ni/ sa bya bar 'du shes pa medo// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
159a6(khri brgyad): bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa med
159a7(khri brgyad): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
159a8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bstan pa zab mo 'di bshad kyang 'phel ba ma mchis la/ ma bshad kyang 'grib pa ma mchis pa de ni ngom
159b1(khri brgyad): lag so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
159b2(khri brgyad): byin pa ni bshad kyang 'phel ba med lam bshad kyang 'grib pa med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji
159b3(khri brgyad): srid 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing / na mkha'i bsngags pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par gyur kyang nam mkha' la ni bsngags pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med la/ bsngags
159b4(khri brgyad): pa ma yin pa brjod kyang 'grib pa medo// nam mkha' la ni bsngags kyang 'phel ba med/ ma bsngags kyang 'grib pa medado// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu mi'i skyes bu ni bsngag
159b5(khri brgyad): ba brjod kyang 'phel ba med la/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod kyang / 'grib pa med do// bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes chags pa med/ bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod
159b6(khri brgyad): kyang khong khro ba med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang bshad kyang de bzhin la/ ma bsha da kyang de bzhin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
159b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa ni zhum par mi 'gyur
159b8(khri brgyad): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang slar mi ldog pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa
160a1(khri brgyad): lagaso/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ nam mkha' bsgom pa legs te/ nam mkha la ni
160a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
160a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs kyang ma mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma mchi
160a4(khri brgyad): namakha' la ni nang stong pa nyid kyang ma mchis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'ab nga ma mchis/ nam mkha 'a la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ 
160a5(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'dral gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnam sa kyang ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni stongs bcu dang / 
160a6(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis// nam mkha' la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang ma
160a7(khri brgyad): mchis/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang ma mchis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
160a8(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub kyang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis// sems can rnams kyi slad du go ma 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam khri
160b1(khri brgyad): slad du brtson par 'aral ba dang / 'bad par 'tshal ba dang / rtsol bar 'tshal ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni namakha'
160b2(khri brgyad): yongasu dgrol bar 'tshal ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis/ nam mkha' lta bu'i chos thams cad kyi slad du go cha 'phel ba
160b3(khri brgyad): de dag ni go cha chen po 'chal ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha chen po 'aral ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la 'degs par 'tshal
160b4(khri brgyad): ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
160b5(khri brgyad): bar 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa thob pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gi/ 
160b6(khri brgyad): de lta bu'i go cha 'tshal ba de dag la bdag phyag 'tshal lag so// de ci 'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong ga/ sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
160b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis 'di lta ste/ dpeng bgyi na/ 'dam bu'i 'tshal lam/ 'od mi'i 'tshal lam/ bur ma shing gi tshal lam/ mda' rgyu'i tshal lam/ til rgya
160b8(khri brgyad): ltar yongasu bltam par gyur cing // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis skal pa 'am/ skal pa las lhag par chos bshad par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang / sems
161a1(khri brgyad): can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag yongasu smin par mdzad kyang bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la ni 'grib pa 'am/ 'phel bar mi mngon
161a2(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du phyogs bcu thams cad
161a3(khri brgyad): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis/ 'di lta ste dper bgyin/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ mnga'
161a4(khri brgyad): rgyu'i tshal lam/ til gyi zhing ltar yongasu blta ma par gyur cing bzhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis skal pa 'am/ skal pa las lhag par chos
161a5(khri brgyad): bshad par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchi sa pa dag yongs su smin par mdzad kyang / bcom ldan 'das
161a6(khri brgyad): sems can gyi khams la ni 'grib pa 'am 'phel bar mi mngon lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ brjod sem tsham ladang sems can dben pa'i slad du ste bcom ldan 'das rnam grang
161a7(khri brgyad): des na bdag gis 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
161a8(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha' yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba la gso zhes gsol to// de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di lta
161b1(khri brgyad): rmas gang yang skye ba yang med/ 'gag pa yang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po dang / ting 'dzin gyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / 
161b2(khri brgyad): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra
161b3(khri brgyad): bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ dkon mchog gsum po sangs rgyas dang / 
161b4(khri brgyad): chos dang / dge 'dun yang yod// chos kyi 'khor long bskor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo sna so// de nas lha'i dang
161b5(khri brgyad): po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol
161b6(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du byed pa de// gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
161b7(khri brgyad): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya bar sems dpa' de ni dmakha' l-i rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin
161b8(khri brgyad): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'ang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 
162a1(khri brgyad): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la/ bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang pa dang / snga ba ji lta bu zhig bgyi lags/ rab 'byor
162a2(khri brgyad): gyis smras pa/ so'u shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang / bsrud pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i chos de yang dag pa rjes su mthong ngam// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab
162a3(khri brgyad): 'byor gang la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bya ba'i chos de ni kho bos yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am
162a4(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo ji skad bstan pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas na/ 'di nyid de la bsrung ba dang / slob pa dang / sbed par 'gyur ro// ji skad bstan
162a5(khri brgyad): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma dral na/ de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// ko'u shi ka byang chub ser sa dpa'
162a6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la/ gang zhig bsrung ba dang / bsrub pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / 
162a7(khri brgyad): bslab pa dang / spa bar sems pa yin no// ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang // smig rgyu dang // rmi lam dang / drag cha dang / mig yor dag bsrung ba
162a8(khri brgyad): dang / bskud pa dang / spa bang nus snyam 'am/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du gang
162b1(khri brgyad): zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de yang 'di ltar
162b2(khri brgyad): mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal pa can du 'gyur bar zad do// ko'u shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa
162b3(khri brgyad): dag bsrung ba dang / bsru pa dang / sba bar bya bar nus snyam 'am/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nu so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ke de
162b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag la bsrung ba dang / bslab pa dang / sba bar bya
162b5(khri brgyad): bar sems pa de yang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang / ngal ba'i skal pa can du 'gyur bar zad do// ko'u shi ka/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings
162b6(khri brgyad): dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa bar nus snyam 'am brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun
162b7(khri brgyad): pa rab 'byor de ni mi nu so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin du gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
162b8(khri brgyad): pa la spre dag la bsrung ba dang / bskyob pa dang / sba bar bya bar sems pa de yang 'di ltar mi 'grub pa dang ngal ba'i skal pa can du 'gyur bar zad// bad+ma byin gyis smras
163a1(khri brgyad): pa btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ji tsam gyis na chos thams cad rmi lam
163a2(khri brgyad): lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yong lta bu dang / dri zi'i grong khyer lta bu dang / chos tha~Mng sprul pa lta bur yongasu shes par 'gyur zhing
163a3(khri brgyad): de ltar yong su shes nas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rmi lam lta bur yang rloms semasu mi byed na// rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom
163a4(khri brgyad): semasu mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom semasu mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom semasu mi byed cing / sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed
163a5(khri brgyad): sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom semasu mi byed/ sbrul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i ma tshan mar yang rlom semasu mi byed pa yin/ 
163a6(khri brgyad): ri ba 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te gzugs rlom sems
163a7(khri brgyad): su mi byed// gzugs bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sem su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sem su mi byed/ gzugs kyi mtshon mang yang rnam sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom
163a8(khri brgyad): semasu mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom semasu mi byed/ rmi'o ma la rlom sems mi byed na/ rmi lam gyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed cing / sprul pa'i bang du rlom
163b1(khri brgyad): semasu mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom semasu mi byed pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba
163b2(khri brgyad): dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rlom semasu mi byed/ rnam par shes pa bdag gi zhes bya ba'i rlom semasu mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam
163b3(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom semasu byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom semasu mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom
163b4(khri brgyad): sems mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar yang rlom sems su mi byed na/ rmi la mo rlom sems
163b5(khri brgyad): mi byed/ rmi lam bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom semasu mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom semasu mi byed/ rmi lam gyi mtshan ma ra yang rlom semasu mi byed cing / sprul pa'i bar du
163b6(khri brgyad): rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa bdag gi zhes bya bar rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom som su mi byed/ sprul pa'i mtshan mar yang rlom semasu mi byed pa yin no// de nas
163b7(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyis mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan
163b8(khri brgyad): dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa 'dun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang
164a1(khri brgyad): ji snyed 'dod pa de dag thams cad lha'i tshan dan gyi phye ma dag thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der do
164a2(khri brgyad): ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig du 'khod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang
164a3(khri brgyad): gnas gtsang mi'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis shar phyogs na sangs rgyas stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang ming 'ad dag nyid kyis ches ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus dge slong rab
164a4(khri brgyad): 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u bying nyid yongasu zhung dang / lha'i dbang po 'du byin sha stag gis/ shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongasu su
164a5(khri brgyad): bdag sems snang bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs 'tshams kun na yang / sangs rgyas stong stong rnam pa 'di dag nyid dang / ming 'di
164a6(khri brgyad): dag nyid kyis chos ston cing // sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u
