164a7(khri brgyad): 'di nyid yongasu zhub dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yongasu zhu bdag sems la snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
164a8(khri brgyad): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
164b1(khri brgyad): pang sangs rgyas nas kyang / sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur// gang dag skal pa bzang po 'di la 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
164b2(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol
164b3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
164b4(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po byams pa/ bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / 
164b5(khri brgyad): mtshan ma gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
164b6(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya bar chos
164b7(khri brgyad): ston par mi 'gyur// de bzhin du gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs sdug ces bya ba
164b8(khri brgyad): dang mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// gzugs ba cings zhes bya ba dang grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur// de bzhin du tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / 'dra byed
165a1(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa
165a2(khri brgyad): bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba dang grol zhes
165a3(khri brgyad): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur// gzugs 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnas
165a4(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba chos ston par mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin du/ ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bang du 'das pa
165a5(khri brgyad): dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur// rnar pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba dang / grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur/ 
165a6(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byangs pa bla na med pa yang dag par
165a7(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar chos ston par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs shin tu rnam par
165a8(khri brgyad): dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyuro// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu
165b1(khri brgyad): rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'ang du shin du rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyuraro// rab 'byor
165b2(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yong su dag pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yong su dag pa'i phyir she
165b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yong su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
165b4(khri brgyad): yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongasasu dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byer gyis
165b5(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongasu dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yo ngasu dag 'phags ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes
165b6(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa 'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam
165b7(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongasasu dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba
165b8(khri brgyad): med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
166a1(khri brgyad): / rna par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa yin no// nga 'byor ni/ 
166a2(khri brgyad): dudam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bang du skye bamed pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'ini rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su
166a3(khri brgyad): dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yong su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha'
166a4(khri brgyad): yong su dag pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 
166a5(khri brgyad): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir yong su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
166a6(khri brgyad): dag pa yin// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lhur nanamakha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
166a7(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa yin// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam
166a8(khri brgyad): mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir
166b1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' smra ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
166b2(khri brgyad): dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ brag cha gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir shes kyi
166b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor na mkha' rab du brjod pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
166b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' rab tu brjod pa ma mchi sa pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
166b5(khri brgyad): 'byor nas mkhar la ni rab tu brjod pa gang yang med/ de ltar na nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i byir/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// 
166b6(khri brgyad): namakha' dmig su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' dmigs su ma mchis
166b7(khri brgyad): pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa ljags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor namakhar la ni ci yang dmigs su med de/ rab 'byong
166b8(khri brgyad): de ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med
167a1(khri brgyad): skye med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / ku nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byung ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no/ rab 'byor de bzhin du rkyor ba dang / 'a
167a2(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag pa dang / dmig su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
167a3(khri brgyad): byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin du rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su
167a4(khri brgyad): med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no// rang
167a5(khri brgyad): 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmi gsu med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
167a6(khri brgyad): par byang ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ btso ma ldan 'das ji ltar na/ chos thams cad shin du rnam par
167a7(khri brgyad): dag pa dang / dmigasu ma mchis pa dang / skye ba mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad
167a8(khri brgyad): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
167b1(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 
167b2(khri brgyad): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la ni/ mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lag so// rna ba'i nang dang / sna'i nad dang / 
167b3(khri brgyad): lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lag so// yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lag so// yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur lagaso// lus ngal bar mi 'gyur lag so// 
167b4(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni gshis ngan du 'chi ra mi 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos te/ na par 'tshal ba'i lha stong phrag mang po dag kyang 'drang
167b5(khri brgyad): bar 'gyur lagaso// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur lag so// gang na dam pa'i
167b6(khri brgyad): chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa dang / lha'i tshogs mang po dag
167b7(khri brgyad): kyang 'du bar 'gyur lag so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa de ni bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te/ bsod nam
167b8(khri brgyad): dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa dag skyed par 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de/ 
168a1(khri brgyad): / bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
168a2(khri brgyad): nga smra bar byed pa de ni/ bsod nams dpag tu med// grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyag gzhal du med// brjod du med pa dag bskyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste
168a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pi 'di ni rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la brten nas// sems can dmyal ba las thar par 'gyur
168a4(khri brgyad): ro/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar par 'gyuraro// gshini rje'i 'jig rten las thar par 'gyur// mi dbul po las thar par 'gyuraro// rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnam
168a5(khri brgyad): su skye bar 'gyuraro// bram ze'i rigs shing sA la/ chen po rnam su skye bar 'gyur// khyim bdag gi rig/ sa shing sA la chen po lta bu rnamasu skye bar 'gyuraro// rgyal chen
168a6(khri brgyad): n+do'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur// 'dushes med 'du shes med mir skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyang
168a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i lo bras bu skyed par byed pa yin no// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'o bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcor pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang
168a8(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de skyed par byed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya chen/ 
168b1(khri brgyad): bstan te/ de la brten nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnam su yod pa dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen
168b2(khri brgyad): po lta bu rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
168b3(khri brgyad): yod pa dang / tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don rnams yod pa dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / 
168b4(khri brgyad): dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min
168b5(khri brgyad): gyi lha rnams dang / namakha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang me dpa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro
168b6(khri brgyad): ba'i lha rnams yod pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bros bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / 
168b7(khri brgyad): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
168b8(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / dran pa
169a1(khri brgyad): / nye bar bzhag pa rnams yod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dpa pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod pa dang
169a2(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid yod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yod pa dang / stobs bcu yod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa
169a3(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'i phyir te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na/ de'i phyir 'di
169a4(khri brgyad): lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che zhes bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la ni skye ba'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam
169a5(khri brgyad): par bya ba'am/ yongasu gzung ba 'am/ dor ba'i chos gang yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang dag skye ba'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon longs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ 
169a6(khri brgyad): yongasu gzung ba 'am/ dor ba'i chos de dag med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa
169a7(khri brgyad): 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ 'dus byas
169a8(khri brgyad): sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmig su med do// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin te/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni chos gang gis kyang mgos pa
169b1(khri brgyad): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor des na pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di gos pa med pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
169b2(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te de ltar 'du shes par yang mi byed/ de ltar rnam par rtog pa yang mi byed/ de ltar spros par yang mi byed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
169b3(khri brgyad): spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba
169b4(khri brgyad): dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas kyang / sems can rnams yongasu
169b5(khri brgyad): smin par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag/ par byed do// ngab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin/ ston par byed pa ma yin/ 
169b6(khri brgyad): 'dzin par byed pa ma yin// sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ skyed par byed pa yang ma yim 'gog par byed pa yang ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byang bar byed pa yang
169b7(khri brgyad): ma yin/ 'grib par byed po yang ma yin/ 'phel byed pa yang ma yisakhas pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang min/ da ltang rgyu ba yang ma yin// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na 'ad
169b8(khri brgyad): pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin// gnas par byed pa yang ma yin// gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/ gnas par
170a1(khri brgyad): / byed nga yang ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin nga sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang
170a2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ dngos po med
170a3(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bor du sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dong bar byed pa yang ma yin/ dran pa nye bor gzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma
170a4(khri brgyad): yin/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 
170a5(khri brgyad): 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ stobs bcu sbyin pa ra byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi dang / 
170a6(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin// 'dor bar byed pa
170a7(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed
170a8(khri brgyad): pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin// soso
170b1(khri brgyad): skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dong bar byed pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 
170b2(khri brgyad): 'dong bar byed pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams
170b3(khri brgyad): 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin no//  ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshes pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang
170b4(khri brgyad): rung / chos kyi dbyings kyi rdul 'di ni gnas pa nyid de/ de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas shing / mngon par thug su chud de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing
170b5(khri brgyad): mngon par thug su chud nas kyang / bsrung ba dang / rnam ngar 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro// de nas lha'i bu 'bum phrag khrag khrig rab tu
170b6(khri brgyad): mang po dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ ca co dang gzha 'don cing lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / ku ma ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / mnad ra ba dag gis gtor nas/ 'di skad du
170b7(khri brgyad): a la la 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo zhes ched du brjod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa na/ de las lha'i bu stong phrag dum
170b8(khri brgyad): dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rangab 'byor dngos po med pa'i
171a1(khri brgyad): / nyid stong pa nyid kyi byig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na chos gang yang 'jug par byaba'am/ ldog par bya ba'i phyir// nye bar gnas pa ma yin pas/ rab 'byor
171a2(khri brgyad): ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa yang ma yin/ gcig pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang
171a3(khri brgyad): 'jug par bgyi ba'am/ ldog par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
171a4(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson
171a5(khri brgyad): 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas s+ho/ ngango // nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 
171a6(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ji nyid kyi bar ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du
171a7(khri brgyad): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ni lam rnams kyis stong ngo // stobs bcu ni stobs bcus stong ngo
171a8(khri brgyad): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang // so so yang dag par rig pa zhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'tsho brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
171b1(khri brgyad): bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo // de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam
171b2(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad nyid kyis stong ngo // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shre
171b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags te/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
171b4(khri brgyad): rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang / chos gang yang
171b5(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyab ma mchis shing / chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor la/ chos gang yang 'ja ga par bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa yang
171b6(khri brgyad): ma mchis te/ chos gang yang yong su mthong ba yang ma mchis la/ chos gang yang yongasu ma mthong ba yang ma ma chis lag so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang 'jug
171b7(khri brgyad): pa 'am/ ldog pa'i chos de dmigasum mchos pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gtan mngon par ma grub pa lags pas// stong pa nyid ni 'jug par bgyid pa
171b8(khri brgyad): 'am ldog par bgyid pa ma lags la/ mtshan ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa yang 'jug par bgyid pa 'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lag so// de ltar na gang shes pa
172a1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / gdags pa dang / 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa
172a2(khri brgyad): dang smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa lag so// shes rab kyi pha rol
172a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma gzung lag so// gang sus kyang ma bstan// sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni/ sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyis lag
172a4(khri brgyad): so/ gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung / sus kyang mngon sum bgyis pa de ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa su yang ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa
172a5(khri brgyad): 'di las su yang sbyin gnasu 'gyur ba yang ma mchis lag so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnas med pa'i le'u
172a6(khri brgyad): zhes bya ste/ sum bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad
172a7(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' med pa'i
172a8(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'di ni mnyam pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
172b1(khri brgyad): 'byor chos thams cad dmigasu med par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dben
172b2(khri brgyad): pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
172b3(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzi ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol
172b4(khri brgyad): pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ga zhi ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
172b5(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ ming med pa dang / lus med pa 'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa
172b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lagaso// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
172b7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam pa
172b8(khri brgyad): dpyod pa dmig su med pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
173a1(khri brgyad): gastsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmis su med pa'i phyi'o/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rang gyi
173a2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
173a3(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'dregs pa lag so// bcom ldan gyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad bzung du med pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol
173a4(khri brgyad): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi bas pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad shin du byang zhing zad pa'i
173a5(khri brgyad): phyir ro// ba 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/ 
173a6(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la nga lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed
173a7(khri brgyad): pa po ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha
173a8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shes pa po dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
173b1(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho dang skye ba
173b2(khri brgyad): dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jigs pa ma mchis pa lagaso// 
173b3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa'i phyi'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
173b4(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam lta bu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam rmis pa da rigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
173b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bri ga cha lta bu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
173b6(khri brgyad): sgra'i brjod pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor lta bu lag so// 
173b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs brnyan dmig su med pa'i phyir po// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
173b8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu lta bu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab po dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
174a1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nga rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// 
174a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
174a3(khri brgyad): pad ma rig pa'i mun pa dmi gsum mchis pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas na
174a4(khri brgyad): mongs pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmig su med pa'i phyin ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
174a5(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan la ngas kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med par
174a6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gso pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
174a7(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
174a8(khri brgyad): dmigs su ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmig su med pa'i phyiro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes
174b1(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
174b2(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ 
174b3(khri brgyad): rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba ma
174b4(khri brgyad): mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rang 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes
174b5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
174b6(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs
174b7(khri brgyad): pa mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
174b8(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmig su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab
175a1(khri brgyad): 'byang gyis gsas pa/ bcom ldam 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rabagyu ro tu na pa rol tu phyin pa dzin 'dod chags ma mtshas pa lams// tsham ldan la
175a2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags kyi mtshan ma dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byar gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na
175a3(khri brgyad): zhe sdang ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ 
175a4(khri brgyad): bam po sum cu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
175a5(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ gti mug gi mun pa rnam par sel ba nyi da kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'a// des 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin
175a6(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongasu rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes
175a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis
175a8(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa do byed pa kon ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba
175b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das
175b2(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma
175b3(khri brgyad): 'dres pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thamam cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol
175b4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nag nog ma mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa'i
175b5(khri brgyad): phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom lnga na 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dngam gyi 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
175b6(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa rnam par rtog pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa
175b7(khri brgyad): 'di ni tshad mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigasu med pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
175b8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mamakha'
176a1(khri brgyad): ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lag
176a2(khri brgyad): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
176a3(khri brgyad): pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad lhag par chags par bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
176a4(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
176a5(khri brgyad): pa/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin
176a6(khri brgyad): ba 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom
176a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa// chos thams
176a8(khri brgyad): cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid lag so// 
176b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos rnams dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
176b2(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byi'i chos rnams dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
176b3(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byi nang gi chos rnams dmigs
176b4(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa
176b5(khri brgyad): tsha lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ s+ho/ nga pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
176b6(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigasu med
176b7(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das
176b8(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa// don dam pa stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i
177a1(khri brgyad): // tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gso
177a2(khri brgyad): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas
177a3(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa sto
177a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
177a5(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
177a6(khri brgyad): bar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngogs su med par phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol
177a7(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni dong ba med pa stong pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
177a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinas da ma bzhin stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi
177b1(khri brgyad): chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid
177b2(khri brgyad): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes
177b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su
177b4(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las
177b5(khri brgyad): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byo ra gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
177b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su
177b7(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid lag so// bcom
177b8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa
178a1(khri brgyad): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ri nyid stong pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol
178a2(khri brgyad): pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus
178a3(khri brgyad): dang tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol
178a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i spong ba lag so// bcom lda na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos rnams dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rang
178a5(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa lag so// bcom ldan
178a6(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyi'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha
178a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i do ni dbang po lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
178a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyi ga rgyas stobs lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// 
178b1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu byin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
178b2(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
178b3(khri brgyad): ni lam lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab
178b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lagaso// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta bar gyur pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis
178b5(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
178b6(khri brgyad): rnam par rtog pa dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa ladra
178b7(khri brgyad): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol
178b8(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad
179a1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'in sgoms par 'jug pa la gso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
179a2(khri brgyad): par 'jug pa dgu dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa lag so// bcom
179a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byer gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
179a4(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ser sna dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
179a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims
179a6(khri brgyad): dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa lagaso// 
179a7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
179a8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha
179b1(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ g.yeng ba dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
179b2(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i shes rab dmig su med pa'i phyi mo/ 
179b3(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos
179b4(khri brgyad): thams tshang dmig su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs
179b5(khri brgyad): pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
179b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thams cad du ye shes chags pa med cing thogs
179b7(khri brgyad): pa med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po lag so// bcom ldan 'das
179b8(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa
180a1(khri brgyad): 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par
180a2(khri brgyad): 'das pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
180a3(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu
180a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni rang byung lag so// bcom ldan 'a/ ngas kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
180a5(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma rgyas 'di ni sangs rgyas lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 2ka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par
180a6(khri brgyad): byang chub pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyang stong pa las/ dmigasu med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum bcu brgyad pa'o// 
180a7(khri brgyad): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyams du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang grag pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la
180a8(khri brgyad): lhag par bya ba byas pa yin la/ gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rgya rnams bskyed cig da
180b1(khri brgyad): ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yong su zin pa yin no// gang dag 'dzin dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs la/ bklags shing kun chub par byas na
180b2(khri brgyad): kyang / de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
180b3(khri brgyad): bar byed pa dang / gzung zhing bcangs la/ daklags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang // de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis ni// sangs rgyas mang po dag la bsnyen bkur byas
180b4(khri brgyad): pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas kyang / mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni sngon rgya
180b5(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang yongasu zhub byis pa yin no// gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
180b6(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang / mi skrag mi dngang zhi nga dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni/ skal pa bye ba pra ga mang po dag nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / chu
180b7(khri brgyad): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa yin no snya mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA
180b8(khri brgyad): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar ma
181a1(khri brgyad): 'gyur la/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par 'gyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yang brtson par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir mi
181a2(khri brgyad): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji lta ba de ltar gzung bar bgyi lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
181a3(khri brgyad): 'dis ni zab lags te/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la ma spyad pa dag gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par rngo mi thog pa'i slad du'o// bcom
181a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar
181a5(khri brgyad): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs pa la gso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes pa
181a6(khri brgyad): kyipha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad pa ma mchis pa dang / dga' ba ma mchis pa dang / dang ba ma mchis pas/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs
181a7(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la 'di skadadu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi
181a8(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par brgya/ phyi stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi// phyi nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom pa
181b1(khri brgyad): bgyi dngos po med pa'i ji nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
181b2(khri brgyad): gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi// mi
181b3(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongasu zhu ba ma bgyis pa'i slad du'o// 
181b4(khri brgyad): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa shA ri'i bu de la ngo mtshar yang ci che ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
181b5(khri brgyad): ni shin tu zab pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par ma gyur pa dang / 
181b6(khri brgyad): smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos par ma gyur pa dang / nang stong
181b7(khri brgyad): po nyid la mos par ma gyur pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mos par ma gyur pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la mos par ma
181b8(khri brgyad): gyur pa yang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
182a1(khri brgyad): lams par ma gyung ba dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mama'ang spong bar byed pa ni ngo mamar mi ma'o// bdun pa shA ring bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
182a2(khri brgyad): la phyag 'tshal ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal// 
182a3(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
182a4(khri brgyad): 'tshal ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
182a5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las nges par byung la/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
182a6(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rab tu bskyed pa yin pa'i phyite/ ko'u shau ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyod pa nyid la gan sa par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos
182a7(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon
182a8(khri brgyad): mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bang 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor
182b1(khri brgyad): lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o// de bzhin du sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
182b2(khri brgyad): dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa
182b3(khri brgyad): dang sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun yongasu bsdu bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
182b4(khri brgyad): dpa' chen ngos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces
182b5(khri brgyad): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnal 'byor du
182b6(khri brgyad): bgyid pa lags/ dri lar na bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnal
182b7(khri brgyad): 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na nang stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ji nyid stong pa
182b8(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na byang chub
183a1(khri brgyad): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
183a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa la spyod na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang // mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas
183a3(khri brgyad): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
183a4(khri brgyad): tro/ ko'u shi ka gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongasu zhu bar sems pa ni legaso leg so// ko'u shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa bskyed pa de yang / sang+yas
183a5(khri brgyad): kyi mthu yin te/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu 'on la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// ko'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems
183a6(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de
183a7(khri brgyad): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yino// 
183a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du mig la mi gnas/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang // yid la mi gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du gzugs la mi gnas/ 
183b1(khri brgyad): sgra dang / dri dang / rong ngo // reg bya dang / chos rnams la mi gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed de// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas
183b2(khri brgyad): por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
183b3(khri brgyad): pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// dngos po med
183b4(khri brgyad): nga'i ngo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha roHphyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol
183b5(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang
183b6(khri brgyad): chub kyi yan lag rnams dang // lam la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// tshad med pa bzhi la mi gnas par shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol
183b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon pa shes pa lnga la mi gnas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa/ 
183b8(khri brgyad): bzhi dang / so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi gnas par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de ci'i
184a1(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la gnas pa dang / gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i gzugs de dmig su med pa dang / de bzhin du gang la gnas pa dang / gang
184a2(khri brgyad): gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang // skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel
184a3(khri brgyad): par 'byung ba dang // pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / 
184a4(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sa ngas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmig su med pa'i daphyir ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
184a5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed/ gang gi phyir gzugs la spyod par mi byed pa de ltar gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
184a6(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du khams
184a7(khri brgyad): rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnamos dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad
184a8(khri brgyad): dang stobs bcu da // mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed de// gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
184b1(khri brgyad): la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la rnal 'byor du byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gzugs mngon gyi
184b2(khri brgyad): mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs phyi mi'i mtha' mi dmigs/ gzugs da ltar byung bar mi dmigs shing // de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
184b3(khri brgyad): ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa da ltar byung bar mi dmigs la/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams
184b4(khri brgyad): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu
184b5(khri brgyad): dngang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so ya nga dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthar
184b6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs/ da ltar byung dang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
184b7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa ni zab pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no// shA
184b8(khri brgyad): ri'i bung bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za' pa yin no// shA ri'i bu
185a1(khri brgyad): de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang // stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
185a2(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig po rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes
185a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol phyin pa zab pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis
185a4(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs gting nga phrag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'a
185a5(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed / na ma par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ gting dpag dka' ba yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kham
185a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 
185a7(khri brgyad): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
185a8(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
185b1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
185b2(khri brgyad): shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 
185b3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
185b4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ rnams tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na pa tshad med pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
185b5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri
185b6(khri brgyad): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang // 'du shes
185b7(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du khamam rnams dang / skye mched rnam
185b8(khri brgyad): dang / rten tshong 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang // mi 'jig
186a1(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / seMs yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab ces bya ba mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
186a2(khri brgyad): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par she
186a3(khri brgyad): ba'i zab ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang // pha rol tu phyin pa
186a4(khri brgyad): rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / seMs yang dag par rig phra rnams
186a5(khri brgyad): dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yi na no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab
186a6(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te gzugs gting dpag
186a7(khri brgyad): dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag
186a8(khri brgyad): dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang // rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dag/ pha rol/ 
186b1(khri brgyad): sbyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stongs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sang+yas kyi
186b2(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid ga
186b3(khri brgyad): min pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / 
186b4(khri brgyad): bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye marnyed rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / 'a rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / nga pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
186b5(khri brgyad): kyis rnams dang / stongs pad+ma dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sas yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyasaphyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi gting dngas
186b6(khri brgyad): dga' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir
186b7(khri brgyad): zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi gting dang ga dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sang+yas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
186b8(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ gal te gzugs cad mo zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam
187a1(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi med pa
187a2(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing // de bzhin
187a3(khri brgyad): du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu
187a4(khri brgyad): rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang // so so yang dag par rig par rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid
187a5(khri brgyad): gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
187a6(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin par phyir ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
187a7(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de tsam du zab pa dang / de tsam du gting dpag dka' ba dang / de tsam du rtogs par dka' ba dang / de tsam du tshad ma mchis pa lags te/ bcom
187a8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni theg pa lagasar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/ 
187b1(khri brgyad): de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ skrag cing dbang la/ dngang b.rar gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
187b2(khri brgyad): po'i mdun du bshad par bgyi ste/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing nam nur 'gyid par mi 'gyur/ the tsom 'tshal
187b3(khri brgyad): bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ba lag so// de nas lha'i dbang po bad+mo byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shI ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg
187b4(khri brgyad): pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad ni nyes pa cir 'gyur/ shA ri'i bus
187b5(khri brgyad): smras pa/ ko'u shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i bya/ nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
187b6(khri brgyad): 'di bshad par gyur na/ skrag cing dngang la/ dngang bar 'gyur zhing phyir bzlog pa dang / phyir spong bar 'gyur te/ mos par mi 'gyur la/ ko'u shi ka gang gi phyir theg pa la gsar du
187b7(khri brgyad): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ byir spong zhing log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i la sogs par 'gyur te
187b8(khri brgyad): de yun ring pos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba'i gnas de yod// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
188a1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po lung bstan pa gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba ltag la yod dam/ shA ri'i
188a2(khri brgyad): bus smras pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba
188a3(khri brgyad): de dag ni ring po mo thogs par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis lnga
188a4(khri brgyad): mi 'da' ba'i bar gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
188a5(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
188a6(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di thos ni/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang par mi 'gyur pa'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / glo ga pa dang / kun chub par byed cing / ji skad bstan
188a7(khri brgyad): pa bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod spyod pa dang / 
188a8(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dper brjod par
188b1(khri brgyad): bdag shin tu spobs lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa bdag shin tu spobs lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod spongs par gyis shig/ shA ri'i
188b2(khri brgyad): bu sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyid na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig gi g.yar lam du shes
188b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
188b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la/ sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis pa'i bar dag rmis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs
188b5(khri brgyad): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa lags par rig par bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag sad pa na she
188b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
188b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par rdzogs
188b8(khri brgyad): par sangs rgyas nas kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis shing // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
189a1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa lta smos ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
189a2(khri brgyad): mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag
189a3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ri
189a4(khri brgyad): po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bstan pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i gshes snyen gyis yongasu zin pa
189a5(khri brgyad): lag so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur
189a6(khri brgyad): zhing rnyeng par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
189a7(khri brgyad): de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du nye ba 'am/ lung bstan par 'gyur ba 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi
189a8(khri brgyad): ldog par 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na// mi zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur tam/ 'brog dgon pa dang ga
189b1(khri brgyad): tshad nyis brgya ba zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag ched bzhi brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur nas/ de byung ba'i
189b2(khri brgyad): tshe grong khyer gyi snga ltas ba lang rdzi dag gam/ phyugs rdzi dag gam/ sa 'tshams sam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ tshal dag gam/ bskyed mos tshal dge mthong bar gyur tam/ grong
189b3(khri brgyad): khyer gyi snga ltas grong dag gam/ grong rdal dag gam/ ljongs dag gam/ yul 'khor dag gam/ mtshan ma gzhan gang rung ba dag mngon par gyur na// de 'di snyam du snga ltas 'di
189b4(khri brgyad): lta bu 'di dga' ba las na/ 'di nas grong dang / grong rda la dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye bar 'gyur snyam nas dbugs drin par
189b5(khri brgyad): 'gyur zhing // de la slan chad chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa'i ma/ gdug pas 'jigs pa 'am/ gdol pa sa 'jigs pa 'am/ gcan zan khro bos 'jigs
189b6(khri brgyad): pa 'am/ bsgres pa 'am/ skom pas 'jigs pa dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab
189b7(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing / rnyed par gyur nas kyang / 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar 'gyid/ klog par bgyid// kun chub par bgyid// tshul bzhin du yid
189b8(khri brgyad): la bgyid na// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan du nye ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ring lor mi thogs pa
190a1(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyung bar rig par bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
190a2(khri brgyad): kyisas 'jigs par mi bgyi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
190a3(khri brgyad): pa zab mo 'di la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba rnyed cing mnyan du rnyed de snga ltas de dag mchis pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
190a4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ceng ba ka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod shin tu spobs par
