273a8(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams/ sems can gyi ris la snying rje chen po bskyed nas gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
273b1(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chang// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
273b2(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston te/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / 
273b3(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa
273b4(khri brgyad): brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba me da pa dang / 'gab pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston
273b5(khri brgyad): cing 'cha'o// rang byang chub skye ba med pa dang / 'gog/ pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par bya/ nga ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do// 
273b6(khri brgyad): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chad do// de bzhin
273b7(khri brgyad): du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
273b8(khri brgyad): pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par chos ston cing 'chang ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
274a1(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi yongasu 'dren par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
274a2(khri brgyad): chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji ltar sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
274a3(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs ni na mkha'i tshul cano zhes
274a4(khri brgyad): chos ston cing 'chang // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni na mkha'i tshul ca no zhes sems can rnams la chos ston
274a5(khri brgyad): cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nam kha'i tshul can no zhes bya bar chos ston to// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med pa
274a6(khri brgyad): ste/ de la 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba medo zhes sems can rnams la chos ston to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med/ 
274a7(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med do// zhes sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de bzhin du rnam pa tham
274a8(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa ste/ de la 'gro ba 'ong ba med do zhes sems can rnams la chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
274b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur
274b2(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul can te/ de dag tshul de las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'gro ba 'am// 
274b3(khri brgyad): 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'anga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtshan ma med pa
274b4(khri brgyad): la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir// rab 'a byor chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul do las mi 'da'o// de ci'i
274b5(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ smon pa med pa la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba// mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i tshul
274b6(khri brgyad): can ste/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'anga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab
274b7(khri brgyad): 'byor chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi
274b8(khri brgyad): 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la/ 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa
275a1(khri brgyad): / phyiraro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmi lam la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs
275a2(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul can dang / mig yor lta bu'i tshul can dang / sprul pa lta bu'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las
275a3(khri brgyad): mi 'anga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sprul pa la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i tshul can te/ de dag
275a4(khri brgyad): ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa/ dang / dngos po med pa la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtha'
275a5(khri brgyad): yas mu med pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'a'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' yas mu med pa la 'gro ba/ 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro// rab
275a6(khri brgyad): 'byor chos thad ni dbri ba med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'anga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbri med pa dang bsnan pa med pa la 'gro ba 'am
275a7(khri brgyad): 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyiro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'i tshul ca no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i tshul
275a8(khri brgyad): can no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni phrad pa med pa dang / 'bral ba med pa dang / 'dre ba med pa dang / mi 'dre ba med pa'i tshul ca no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdeg
275b1(khri brgyad): gi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bdag la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sems can gyi
275b2(khri brgyad): tshul can no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni srog dang skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba
275b3(khri brgyad): po dang / slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bdag gtan med cing srog dang / skye ba
275b4(khri brgyad): po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / sheng bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba
275b5(khri brgyad): po yang gtan med na/ rab 'byor 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta/ dmigs par ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rtag pa'i tshul can te de dag ni tshul de
275b6(khri brgyad): las mi 'anga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rtag pa ci yang gtan med na/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bde ba'i tshul can te/ de dag
275b7(khri brgyad): ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi tshul can te/ sdug pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rtag
275b8(khri brgyad): pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang sdug pa gtan med na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa'i tshul cano// rab 'byor
276a1(khri brgyad): chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
276a2(khri brgyad): mi rtag pa gtan med cing / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa gtan med na/ de'i 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'ad
276a3(khri brgyad): chags kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni rdul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi dngos po med na/ 'dod chags lta ga la yod / rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lha
276a4(khri brgyad): bar gyur pa'i dngas pos snang gi rdul can skyed/ gan tshul de las pa 'ang // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lta bar gyur pa'i dngas po gtan med na/ lnga bar
276a5(khri brgyad): palta ga la yod/ rab 'byor ches thams cad ni de ban na nyid kyi tshul can te/ de dag tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la 'gro ba 'am/ 
276a6(khri brgyad): 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul cano// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshul can dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul
276a7(khri brgyad): can dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la 'gro ba la/ 
276a8(khri brgyad): 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni g.yo ba'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos 'ga' la
276b1(khri brgyad): yang g.yo ba med pas 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med pa'i phyir// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
276b2(khri brgyad): 'byor gzugs gtan med na/ de'i 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
276b3(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni tshul de las mi 'anga'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa gtan mi dmigs na/ de'i 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba dmigs par
276b4(khri brgyad): lta ga la 'gyur// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul can te/ de dag ni chu de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa
276b5(khri brgyad): gtan med na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdo'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rba mas cad ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
276b6(khri brgyad): can no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ca te de dag ni tshul de las mi
276b7(khri brgyad): 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med na de'i 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad nang stong pa
276b8(khri brgyad): nyid kyi tshul ca no// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po
277a1(khri brgyad): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gtan med na/ de'i 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i
277a2(khri brgyad): tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gtan med na de dag gi 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba lta ba la yod/ rab
277a3(khri brgyad): 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang stobs
277a4(khri brgyad): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so yang dag pa dar rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba co brgyad kyi tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi
277a5(khri brgyad): 'da'// de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i
277a6(khri brgyad): tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas
277a7(khri brgyad): kyi tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor chos thams cad
277a8(khri brgyad): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshul can te de dag ni tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
277b1(khri brgyad): chub la ni 'gro ba'am 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur lag
277b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir spyod spyod pa
277b3(khri brgyad): dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongasu smin par byas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas mang
277b4(khri brgyad): po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
277b5(khri brgyad): zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu
277b6(khri brgyad): rtsa drug pa'o// / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
277b7(khri brgyad): mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi rtags rnams dang / rnam pa rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams dang / rang bzhin du 'gyur ba gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
277b8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol
278a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni 'dod chags bsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin can dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug bsal bas dben pa'i rang
278a2(khri brgyad): bzhin can du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni
278a3(khri brgyad): zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor
278a4(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sda gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
278a5(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'bri/ rtogs par 'gyur ba de dag ji lta bu'i tshul can du
278a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
278a7(khri brgyad): 'di rtogs pa de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
278a8(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi rten lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin// de de bzhin te/ rang/ 
278b1(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos pa de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can yin pas sems can
278b2(khri brgyad): thams cad kyi rten yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can tham
278b3(khri brgyad): cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha de dag 'tshal la/ de la sems can dang sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs pa ni dka' ba bgyingad ba lag so// bcom
278b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis sems can
278b5(khri brgyad): thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha de bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yino// rab 'a byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha
278b6(khri brgyad): de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs dang byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bas na go ca de ni gzugs
278b7(khri brgyad): dang 'brel ba ma yino zhes bya'o// rab 'byor go cha de ni tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'brel ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
278b8(khri brgyad): rab 'byor rnam par shes pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bas nag chang ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa yin no// rab 'byor
279a1(khri brgyad): go cha de ni bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhing sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang shed las skyes pa dang
279a2(khri brgyad): shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / slong ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin// rab 'byor go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
279a3(khri brgyad): kyi bar dang 'brel pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtan med la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i/ 
279a4(khri brgyad): phyir te/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin no// rab 'byor kye ma shes rab kyi
279a5(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang / ga gis 'di ltar bdag cag gis sems can tha/ dmas cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes
279a6(khri brgyad): go cha bags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems de pa' chen po'i go cha de ni chos thams cad dang 'brel ba ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
279a7(khri brgyad): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
279a8(khri brgyad): kyi sa'i gnas gnyis mi mchi bar 'tshal bar bgyi ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gnas ma mchis shing go skabs ma lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
279b1(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes de ltar go cha 'tshal ba de nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba de na gnas
279b2(khri brgyad): ma mchis lagaso// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sa mtshams bkum ste/ sems can rnams kyi tshod du go cha 'tshal
279b3(khri brgyad): ba ma lags pa'i sladu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gyis don gyi dbang
279b4(khri brgyad): ci zhig mthong na 'di skad du byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di la
279b5(khri brgyad): spyod pa de ni/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis las gnas gcig tu mi 'a gro bar shes par bya'o zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis
279b6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyogs gcig gi sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags kyi
279b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha 'tshal ba lags so// bcom
279b8(khri brgyad): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
280a1(khri brgyad): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyogs gcig gi sems can rnams kyi
280a2(khri brgyad): phyir go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba dang / rnam pa thams
280a3(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyir go cha bags pa yin// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab lags te/ 
280a4(khri brgyad): de ni sus kyang bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ gang du yang bsgom par bgyi bam lags/ ji ltar yang bsgom par bgyi ngam lagaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom
280a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dil ni gang bsgom pa dang / gang la bsgom pa dang / gang gis bsgom pa'i chos 'ga' yongasu grub pa yang
280a6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa lag so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
280a7(khri brgyad): bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad ma mchis pa bsgom pa lag so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa lag so// bcom ldan
280a8(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yong su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu
280b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa pasgos 'dzag pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par
280b2(khri brgyad): 'jig pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par 'jigs pa lags
280b3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni tsher ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jigs pa
280b4(khri brgyad): lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
280b5(khri brgyad): ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'ja ga pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
280b6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lag so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
280b7(khri brgyad): pa bsgom pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi sgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni
280b8(khri brgyad): nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par 'jog pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa leg so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
281a1(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lag so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu
281a2(khri brgyad): phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lag
281a3(khri brgyad): so 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ stobs bcu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lag so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni mi
281a4(khri brgyad): 'jigs pa dang / sau yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lag so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
281a5(khri brgyad): pa bsgom pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lag so// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong
281a6(khri brgyad): ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
281a7(khri brgyad): du bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
281a8(khri brgyad): pa de ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yin// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
281b1(khri brgyad): bsgom pa rnam par 'jig pa yino// rab 'byor ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par zhen par mgyur tam zhes/ 
281b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ bsam gtan
281b3(khri brgyad): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las
281b4(khri brgyad): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag las phyir mi ldog
281b5(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongasu brtag par bya ste/ ci byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
281b6(khri brgyad): mngon par zhen par ma gyur tam/ ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de gzhan gyis smras pa
281b7(khri brgyad): dang / gzhan gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta ba 'am/ ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod
281b8(khri brgyad): pa de gzhan gyis dad pas mi 'gro 'am/ ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de 'dod chag
282a1(khri brgyad): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi 'phrogs sam/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi 'phrogs sam/ 
282a2(khri brgyad): ci phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
282a3(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
282a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ ci phyir mi de ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de shes rab
282a5(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na mi skrag gam/ mi dngang ngam/ dngang bar mi 'gyur ram/ zhum par mi 'gyur ram/ 'gong bar mi 'gyur ram/ de'i
282a6(khri brgyad): yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur ram/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi 'bral lam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa la mngon
282a7(khri brgyad): par dga' ma/ thos nas kyang 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed dam/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed dam zhes brtag par
282a8(khri brgyad): bya'o// rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi dus na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dri ba byas pa dang / 
282b1(khri brgyad): gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i
282b2(khri brgyad): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston pa na/ mi skrag mi dngang / dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / zhum par mi 'gyur te/ 
282b3(khri brgyad): 'gong bar mi 'gyur/ yid phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin
282b4(khri brgyad): yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis ga sol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
282b5(khri brgyad): zab mo 'di ston pa na/ mi skrag mi dngang / da ngang bar mi 'gyur zhing zhum par mi 'gyur/ 'god bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i yid phyir phyogs par yang mi 'gyur
282b6(khri brgyad): ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnam par spyod par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
282b7(khri brgyad): pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems kyi rgyud rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
282b8(khri brgyad): la rnam par spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rgyud rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
283a1(khri brgyad): la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnam par spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
283a2(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la gzhol ba dang / stong pa nyid la bab pa dang / stong pa nyid la 'bab pas shes rab kyi
283a3(khri brgyad): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par spyod pa yin// rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba dang / smon pa med pa la gzhol ba dang / sems
283a4(khri brgyad): kyi rgyud na mkha' la gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor sems kyi rgyud skye ba med pa dang / 'ag ga pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med
283a5(khri brgyad): ba dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba dang / sems kyi rgyud de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang // yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa nyid dang / 
283a6(khri brgyad): bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med la gzhol bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par spyod pa yin// rab 'byor sems kyi
283a7(khri brgyad): rgyud rmi lam lta bu la gzhol ba dang / sprul pa lta bu la gzhol bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par spyod pa yin// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
283a8(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyi rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud stong pa nyid la gzhol bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
283b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par spyod pa yin zhes bgyi ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud rmi lam lta bu'i bar la gzhol bas shes
283b2(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnam par spyod pa yin zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la yang rnam
283b3(khri brgyad): par spyod par bgyid lags sam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la yang rnam par spyod par bgyid lags sam/ de bzhin du rnam/ 
283b4(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yang rnam par spyod par bgyid lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
283b5(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rnam par spyod par mi byed//  ra ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la yang rnam par spyod par mi byed// 
283b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rnam par spyod par mi byedado// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
283b7(khri brgyad): 'byor 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sus kyang ma byas/ 'gyur bar ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song // gang na yang mi 'dug la/ yul
283b8(khri brgyad): na yang mi gnas phyogs na yang mi gnas te/ de la ni grangs dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mi dmigs/ gang la grangs dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni
284a1(khri brgyad): sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / 
284a2(khri brgyad): sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar gyis mngon pa
284a3(khri brgyad): rdzogs par byang chub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa dang / tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed
284a4(khri brgyad): nyid dang / rnam por shes pa nyid rnam pa thams nga mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyiraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
284a5(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig/ de ba zhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 
284a6(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pha rol
284a7(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so yang dag par rig pa
284a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid yino// de ni sangs rgyas kyi
284b1(khri brgyad): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid yin// shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ 'dod chags 'dul ba'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// 
284b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa// bam po sum cu rtsa drug pa/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma
284b3(khri brgyad): blangs shing / lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dag blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su gtor te// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das
284b4(khri brgyad): ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyog/ ras gcig tu 'khod// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang
284b5(khri brgyad): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa/ 'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dos da ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin
284b6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa zab mo 'di las/ 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad
284b7(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzug so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams
284b8(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
285a1(khri brgyad): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis byar med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar bya
285a2(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni gcig ste/ gnyisu med cing gnyisu dbyer medo zhes ston pa 'di
285a3(khri brgyad): lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab cing / mthong ba dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ste/ brtag mi nus shing / rtog ge'i spyod
285a4(khri brgyad): yul ma lags la zhi ba/ zhib mo brtag pa'i mkhas pa dang / 'dzangs pas rig pa lags te/ 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lag so// de skad ces gsol
285a5(khri brgyad): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / zugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces pa ka' stsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ 
285a6(khri brgyad): de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyang ge zug so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du
285a7(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// / 
285a8(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi bar nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas so// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
285b1(khri brgyad): pi dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig ste/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 
285b2(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig ste/ gnyis su
285b3(khri brgyad): med cing gnyi su dbyer med// don gyi dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung ngu la thugs gzhol te/  ma la gzhol ba ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe
285b4(khri brgyad): na/ kye ma 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni zab cing mthong bar dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ste/ brtag mi nus shing / rtog
285b5(khri brgyad): ke'i spyod yul ma yin la/ zhi ba zhib mo brtags pa'i mkha sa pa dang / 'dzangs pas rig pa 'jig rten pa thams ca da dang mi mthun pa yin te/ de ni sus kyang
285b6(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas shing / gang du yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis kun du rgyu ba med pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// lnga'i
285b7(khri brgyad): bu dag na mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa dang / chos kyi dbyings zab pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa dang / bsam gyis
285b8(khri brgyad): mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa
286a1(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du byed me mnyam pa nyid dang / bdag zab pa
286a2(khri brgyad): nyid dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor ba dang / 'du
286a3(khri brgyad): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa dang / tshul khrims dang / 
286a4(khri brgyad): bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyidar chos 'od zab po// nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i
286a5(khri brgyad): phyir chos 'di zab po// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong/ pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir/ chos 'di zab po// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par
286a6(khri brgyad): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam zab pa'i phyir/ chos 'di zab po// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
286a7(khri brgyad): bya dang / sau yang dag par rig pa zab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du zab pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i
286a8(khri brgyad): phyir/ lha'i bu dag kye mchos 'di zab po// lha'i bu rnams kyi gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i chos 'di bstan lag so// de ci'i
286b1(khri brgyad): phyir she na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs bzung ba'i slang du bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i spangang yang ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams da
286b2(khri brgyad): rnam par shes pa bzung ba'i slad bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i sla du yang ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'i slad bstan pa
286b3(khri brgyad): ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i sla du yang ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i slad yang ma lags pa'i slanga'o// bcom ldan
286b4(khri brgyad): 'das chos bstan pa zab mo 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad bstan pa ma lags/ mi bzung ba'i sla du yang ma lags/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
286b5(khri brgyad): bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ 
286b6(khri brgyad): mi bzung ba'i slad du yang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzug so// bdag ni gzug so// bdag ni tshor ba'o// 'du sheso// 'du byed rnam so// rnam
286b7(khri brgyad): par shes pa'o// bdag ni rnam par shes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bdag
286b8(khri brgyad): ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bdag gi lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 
287a1(khri brgyad): bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do// bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid do// bdag gi rang byang chub nyid// bdag ni rang
287a2(khri brgyad): byang chub bo// bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das
287a3(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhino// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa yang ma yin/ mi bzung ba'i phyir bstan pa
287a4(khri brgyad): yang ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed na/ mas dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ba snyan pa yang ma yin/ mi gzung ba'i phyir bstan
287a5(khri brgyad): pa yang ma yino// lha'i bu dag gang dag gzugs gzung ba/ 'i phyir spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag la ni
287a6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i bskal ba med// bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du sgom
287a7(khri brgyad): par mi nu so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgom par mi nus// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang mthun pa lags te
287a8(khri brgyad): chos 'di chos gang dag dang mthun pa logs zhe na chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
287b1(khri brgyad): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang
287b2(khri brgyad): mthun pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang mthun pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun pa
287b3(khri brgyad): lag so bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'thun pa lag so// chos 'di ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis pa lags te/ ci la thogs pa
287b4(khri brgyad): ma mchis pa lags zhe na/ gzugs la thogs pa ma mchi sa pa lag so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma
287b5(khri brgyad): mchis pa lag so// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis pa lag so// tshes 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin
287b6(khri brgyad): nyid mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyisamanyam pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
287b7(khri brgyad): mamed pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis
287b8(khri brgyad): pa mnyam pa nyid kyi sla du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid lag so// chos 'di ni gzugs skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes
288a1(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
288a2(khri brgyad): skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i slad skye ba ma mchis pa lag so// chos 'di ni gzugs kyi gzhi dmig su ma mchis pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
288a3(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi dmigasu ma mchis pa lag so// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi dmigasu ma mchis pa'i sla gan ma mchis pa log
288a4(khri brgyad): seM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pan spyong ba dang // gzugs na sbyong ba'i lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brten rab 'byor ni bcom
288a5(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyi rjesu skyes lag so// de ci'i sla zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas gtan rab 'byor ci dang ci ston pa de dag thams cad stong pa nyid kho na las brtsams te/ ston
288a6(khri brgyad): ba'i sladu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du bcom ldan
288a7(khri brgyad): 'das gnas gtan rab 'byor 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rje su skyes pa lag so zhes smras pa ni ji ltar rje su skyes pa gnas gtan rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das rjesu skyes pa
288a8(khri brgyad): yin zhe na/ de bzhin du rab 'byor gying bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song ba ste/ de ltar na gnas gtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes skyes pa yin no// de bzhin
288b1(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid de/ de ltar gnas gtan
288b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gnas gtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid gnas
288b3(khri brgyad): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes pa yin no// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab
288b4(khri brgyad): 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa la/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang la yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du
288b5(khri brgyad): chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang la ya nga thogs pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin
288b6(khri brgyad): nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyi su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin nyid ni ma byas pa ste/ de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa yang med gang gi phyir de bzhin
288b7(khri brgyad): nyid de gang gi de bzhin nyid du mgyur pa yang yod cing / nam yang de bzhin nyid du ma gyur ma yin pa de'i phyir de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyi su dbyer med de/ 
288b8(khri brgyad): de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad 'gyur ba
289a1(khri brgyad): med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste/ de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par
289a2(khri brgyad): rtog pa med do// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa dmig su med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa
289a3(khri brgyad): dbyer med pa dmigasu med pa'o// de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa dmigs su med pa ste/ de ltar na gnas brtan
289a4(khri brgyad): rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de zhin nyi rang gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud
289a5(khri brgyad): na yod pa ma yin te/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gung na yod pa ma yin pa gang yin pade/ ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin zhing de ni rtag tu de bzhin
289a6(khri brgyad): // gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de lta bu ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa gzhan ma yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes skyes kyang gang du yang skyes pa med do// 
289a7(khri brgyad): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa
289a8(khri brgyad): ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin no// de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma
289b1(khri brgyad): yin te/ de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje su skyes pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu dag 'di la 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gsheg
289b2(khri brgyad): pa'i de bzhin nyid du rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid// ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid
289b3(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa de bzhin nyid mnyam
289b4(khri brgyad): pa nyid// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma nyam pa nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
289b5(khri brgyad): mnyam pa nyid kyis de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyi nga mnyam pa nyid do// de ltar na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin
289b6(khri brgyad): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gnyi su med gnyisu dbyer med do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
289b7(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid kyi bzhin nyid// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
289b8(khri brgyad): nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams/ rnam par shes pa'i bzhin nyid// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
290a1(khri brgyad): dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis
290a2(khri brgyad): med gnyisu dbyer med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bdag gi
290a3(khri brgyad): bzhin nyid do// de bzhin du shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshes pa'i de bzhin nyid
290a4(khri brgyad): kyis shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid// de ltar na bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de
290a5(khri brgyad): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni ga nyi su ming gnyi su dbyer me // de bzhin du sbyar/ te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / 
290a6(khri brgyad): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
290a7(khri brgyad): nyid ni gnyi su med de gnyisu dbyer medo// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs
290a8(khri brgyad): pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyi su med de gnyi su dbyer mdo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po
290b1(khri brgyad): dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su bde gnyis dbyer med do// de bzhin gshegs
290b2(khri brgyad): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin
290b3(khri brgyad): nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid// de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mtshan
290b4(khri brgyad): ba nyid kyang bzhin gshegs pa'ang bzhan nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa'ade bzhin nya mkhan pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid // de ltar na rnam pa thams
290b5(khri brgyad): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhi na gsheg pa de bzhin nyid de ni gnyi su med gnyi su da byer med do// lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag
290b6(khri brgyad): pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon lnga rus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan brnye so// de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di
290b7(khri brgyad): bshad pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rang 'gul lo// g.yos rab tu g.yos kun
290b8(khri brgyad): du rab tu g.yos so// ldeg rab tu ldeg kun du ldeg go// chem chem rab tu chem chem kun du rab tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ar 'ur ro// 
291a1(khri brgyad): 'khrug rab tu 'khrugs kun du rab tu 'khrug so// shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'o// nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'o// byang / 
291a2(khri brgyad): phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'o// lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'o// mtha' mthon dbus dpa'o// dbus mtho ni mtha' nga ma'o// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / 
291a3(khri brgyad): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha'i tsan dan gyi phyi ma dag gis gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par
291a4(khri brgyad): rab tu gtor nas 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su
291a5(khri brgyad): skyes pa ni ngo mtshar lags so zhes tshig tu ba/ rjod do// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lnga// 'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste lha'i bu de
291a6(khri brgyad): ngag la 'di skad ces smraso// lha'i bu dag 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjesu ma skyes/ gzugs las gzhan gyi rjesu mi skyes so// gzugs kyi
291a7(khri brgyad): de bzhin nyid kyi rjesu mi skyesagazug de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rje sum
291a8(khri brgyad): skyes/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rje su ma skyeso// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjesu
291b1(khri brgyad): ma skyes so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so// rnam
291b2(khri brgyad): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rje su ma skyes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so// 'dus byas
291b3(khri brgyad): kyi rjes su ma skyes// 'dus byas pas gzhan gyi rje su ma skyes so// 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan
291b4(khri brgyad): gyi rjes su ma skyes// 'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rje su ma skyes// 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rje su ma skyes/ 
291b5(khri brgyad): 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan/ gyi rjes su ma skyes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis rje su skyes pa dang / gang rje su skyes pa
291b6(khri brgyad): chos de med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid dang / 
291b7(khri brgyad): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / 
291b8(khri brgyad): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni zab pa ste/ de la ni gzugs mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzugs
292a1(khri brgyad): nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de la tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
292a2(khri brgyad): shes pa mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur
292a3(khri brgyad): de bzhin du sbyar te/ de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
292a4(khri brgyad): pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
292a5(khri brgyad): bu de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu de bzhi na nyid ni zab pa ste/ de la gzugs mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang
292a6(khri brgyad): mi dmigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/ rnam
292a7(khri brgyad): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ 
292a8(khri brgyad): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmig
292b1(khri brgyad): na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di
292b2(khri brgyad): bshad pa na/ dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grolo// dge slong ma lnga brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang
292b3(khri brgyad): bral ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob// byang chub sems dpa' yong su nyams pa'i chos chos can drug bcu ni len pa
292b4(khri brgyad): med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par gro lo// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sa ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bsnyen bkur byas te/ thams
292b5(khri brgyad): cadu sbyin pa byin tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam pa tan bskyed/ shes rab bsgoms kyang de dag shes rab kyi pha
292b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pas yongasu ma zin cing thabs la mkhas pas yongasu ma zin pas 'di ltar sbyar te/ 'di ni sbyin pa'o// 'di lo sbyin par bya'o// bdag gis tshul khrims 'di bsrung
292b7(khri brgyad): bzod pa 'di bsgo mo// brtson 'grus 'di brgya mo// bsam gtan 'di la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o// shes rab 'di bsgom par bya'o snyam du de ltar spyod pas/ de dag shis
292b8(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs la mkhas pas yongasu ma zin pas/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / 
293a1(khri brgyad): shes rab bsgom zhing de dag 'du shes sna tshogs la spyod pas tha dad pa med pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la
293a2(khri brgyad): ma zhug so// de dag byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ma zhugs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar dang 'thob po// shA ri'i bu gzhan
293a3(khri brgyad): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam stong pa nyid/ mtshan ma med pa 'am/ smon pa med pa yong mod kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
293a4(khri brgyad): bral zhing thabs la mkhas pas yongasu ma zin na/ ya nga dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyasu 'gyu ro// shA ri'i
293a5(khri brgyad): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad/ stong / pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgom su 'dra yang
293a6(khri brgyad): thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba dag yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyasu 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
293a7(khri brgyad): rnams ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom du bas kyang / thabs la mkhas pa la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang
293a8(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
293b1(khri brgyad): nyid kyi sems dang bral bar stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bsgom zhing thabs la mkhas pa la ma brten pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyasu
293b2(khri brgyad): 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba rnams ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
293b3(khri brgyad): ba dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams bsgom zhing / thabs la mkhas pa la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
293b4(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na 'dab chags bya zhig lus dpag tshad brgya 'am/ lus dpag tshad nyis brgya 'am/ dpag
293b5(khri brgyad): tshad sum brgya 'am/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya 'am/ dang ga tshad lnga brgya zhig yod la de sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ong bar sems
293b6(khri brgyad): la/ bya de yang 'dab ma med pa zhig yin zhing / de sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas bdag nyid mchongs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro bar bya bar sems la gal te bya nges sa
293b7(khri brgyad): lam ltung bar 'di snyam du sems te ma la 'dag sum bcu rtsa gyi lha'i ri su gnas par bya'o snyam du bsams na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ bya de phyir sum bcu rtsa
293b8(khri brgyad): gsum gyi lha'i nang du gnas par nus snyam 'am/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni rngo mi thogs lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal
294a1(khri brgyad): te de bar snang de nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag ma smras ma snang bar 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par bya'o snyam du bsams na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 
294a2(khri brgyad): bya de ma smas ma snang bar 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par 'gyur snyam 'am/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ongs de ni rngo mi thogs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bya
294a3(khri brgyad): de ni smras pa 'am/ snang bar yang 'gyur la/ 'dzam bu'i gling du ma mchis par 'gum pa 'am/ 'gum pa la thug par sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur lag so// de ci'i slod
294a4(khri brgyad): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de ni lus che la 'dab ma mar mchis shing / mthun po zhig nas mchongs pas de ltar gyur du gdon mi 'tshal lag so// bcom ldan
294a5(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang / chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye na snyed dag du sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ tshul khrim
294a6(khri brgyad): srung / bzod pa sgom/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug cing / bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
294a7(khri brgyad): bar bya ba'i phyir de'i 'jug pa yang che/ sems bskyed pa yang che/ phan gdags par bsam pa yang tshad med zin kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing
294a8(khri brgyad): thabs la mkhas pas yongasu ma zin na/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
294b1(khri brgyad): chen po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bar sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan
294b2(khri brgyad): bskyed kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/ des na nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
294b3(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi sar lhung // shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / 
294b4(khri brgyad): ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i yis gzigs pa sems shing kun du 'dzin la mtshan mar byed kyang / de bzhin
294b5(khri brgyad): gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims mi shes/ rnam pa ra grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i bar du mi she sa na/ de mi shes shing khongs du ma chung bas
294b6(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra thos na zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzin te/ mtshan mar bzu nga nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
294b7(khri brgyad): byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo bar byed// de ltar yongasu bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyuraro// de ci'i
294b8(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
295a1(khri brgyad): chub tu yong su bsngo bar byed pa ning ltar 'jur te/ de nyan thos kyis 'am/ rangs su rgyas pa spyad// shArA 'byu di la byung chub stsa
295a2(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma brel bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ tshul khrims
295a3(khri brgyad): bsrung / bzod pa bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba ste/ 'das
295a4(khri brgyad): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang // ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par
295a5(khri brgyad): grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa de tha~Mng mtshan mar mi 'dzin te/ de stong pa nyid kyi 'dzin la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
295a6(khri brgyad): ba med pa'i tingange 'dzin la mtshan mAr mi 'dzin na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi
295a7(khri brgyad): 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa byin yang
295a8(khri brgyad): mtshan mar ma bzung / tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs/ shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzu
295b1(khri brgyad): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / tingange 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par
295b2(khri brgyad): grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ba'i phyir ro// shA
295b3(khri brgyad): ri'i bu 'di ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan
295b4(khri brgyad): la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab ba sgom pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod kyang mtshan mar ma bzung ba 'di ni byang chub
295b5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yin// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
295b6(khri brgyad): pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas
295b7(khri brgyad): ba dang ma bral ba de'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom ma mchis lag so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sem
295b8(khri brgyad): dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba dang / gang gis mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzo/ 
296a1(khri brgyad): pa'i 'tshang rgya ba'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes ma/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
296a2(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar gyi chos gang yang ma dmigs pa'i sladu'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol
296a3(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom mchis par rig par bgyi lag so// de ci'i
296a4(khri brgyad): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la
296a5(khri brgyad): mkhas pa dang bral ba dag gis/ sbyin pa ci dang ci stsal pa/ de thams cad ni mtshan mar bzung nas sprul pa/ te dang / tshul khrims ci dang ci bsrungs pa dang / bzod pa
296a6(khri brgyad): bsgrubs pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bsam gtan gang dang gang la mnyam par gzhag pa de thaMd kyang mtshan mar bzung nas mnyam par gzhag pa'i slang ste/ 
296a7(khri brgyad): do'i smyud byung chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gi blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom mchis par rig par
296a8(khri brgyad): ram gi bcom ldan 'das gyur lags pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ma ldan med pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdzan par rdzogs par #
296b1(khri brgyad): bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral bar bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa la gnas te/ mi dmigs
296b2(khri brgyad): pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyi sbyin pa sprul bar bgyi// tshul khrims bsrungs par bgyi/ bzod pa bsgrubs par bgyi/ brtson 'grus brtsam par
296b3(khri brgyad): bgyi/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bgyi/ shes rlob bsgom par bgyi'o// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyad par bgyi'o// de nas bco
296b4(khri brgyad): ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lho'i bu rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
296b5(khri brgyad): chen pos chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang / rgya bar yang bgyi bar 'tshal / chos de dag kyang nga ma mchis shing mi dmigs pas bla na med pa yang
296b6(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par 'byung bar dka' ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
296b7(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub ni mngon par 'byung bar dka' ba yin// lha'i bu dag ngas kyang chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ ngas ni gang
296b8(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs/ 
297a1(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dag chos thams cad shin du rnam par dag pa'i phyir// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di
297a2(khri brgyad): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par 'byung bar dka'o zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom
297a3(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba dang / bdag sems pa ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par
297a4(khri brgyad): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar sA lags// de ci'i sa zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa su yang ma mchis
297a5(khri brgyad): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ci yang ma mchis pas chos thams cad ni stong pa lag sa te/ chos thaMng stong pa ni gang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
297a6(khri brgyad): rgyu bar bgyi ba dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de ma mchis pa'i sladu'o// de ci'i sla
297a7(khri brgyad): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni stong pa lags te/ chos gaglang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba 'am/ yongasu 'grib par bgyi ba'i slad/ sbyin pa
297a8(khri brgyad): stsol bar bgyid pa dang / bsam gtan gyi bar la snyoms par 'jug par bgyid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa'i chos de dag kyang ma ma/ 
297b1(khri brgyad): shing gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid pa dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams
297b2(khri brgyad): cad kyang stong pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
297b3(khri brgyad): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gla lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
297b4(khri brgyad): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par she/ das pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thaMd mkhyen pa
297b5(khri brgyad): nyid kyis stong pa'i slang du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs nges
297b6(khri brgyad): na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di skad na mkha' ni 'di snyam
297b7(khri brgyad): du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs bya'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du mi sem so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
297b8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'di snyam du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar bya'o snyam du me
298a1(khri brgyad): beb na phyir nan/ da ltar na sa thams cad nas nga mnyam pa te/  nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dang na
298a2(khri brgyad): thanam thams cad namakha' ga mas nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngan por rdzogs par 'otshang rgyar// gal te byang chub sa
298a3(khri brgyad): dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rgyas thams cad na mkha' lta ngur mos par mi byung byung than me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha
298a4(khri brgyad): rgya bar smra ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha rgyu bar dka' ba ma yon nan/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bla na med pa yang
298a5(khri brgyad): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang mi 'gyuraro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
298a6(khri brgyad): chub ni mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyu bar dka' ste/ mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya bar zla ba ma yin par mngono// de nas tshe dang ldan par ba 'byor gyis tshe dang ljon
298a7(khri brgyad): ba shA ri'i tshul 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam 'am/ 
298a8(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma mno// smras pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
298b1(khri brgyad): byang chub las ldog snyam 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yino// smras pa/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin nyid kyi bar dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
298b2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog snyam 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni me yino// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa
298b3(khri brgyad): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de gzugs las gud na yod snyam 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yino// smras pa/ gang bla na med
298b4(khri brgyad): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa 'i chos de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam sa dang / rnam par shes pa las gud na yod snyam 'am
298b5(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor don ma yino// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog/ sa pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de rnam pa thad
298b6(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las gud na yong snyam 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yino// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs
298b7(khri brgyad): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang
298b8(khri brgyad): yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
299a1(khri brgyad): / 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na/ yod snyam/ 
299a2(khri brgyad): 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yi no// smras pa/ de bzhin du gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
299a3(khri brgyad): nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod snyam 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yino// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin
299a4(khri brgyad): nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yino// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du
299a5(khri brgyad): sems/ chos nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam 'am/ chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid deng / chos skyon med pa nyid
299a6(khri brgyad): dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog snyam 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
299a7(khri brgyad): de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de bzhin nyid las gud na
299a8(khri brgyad): yod snyam 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems// gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
299b1(khri brgyad): byang chub las ldog pa'i chos de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi bar las gud na yod snyam 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ de
299b2(khri brgyad): ltar bden pa'i tshul bzhin du chos de dag mi dmigs na/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos de gang yin/ de skad
299b3(khri brgyad): ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa des bstan pa
299b4(khri brgyad): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog pa gang yang med de/ de'i phyir gang
299b5(khri brgyad): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gsum po gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gsum po de
299b6(khri brgyad): ngag rnam par gzhag par yang mi 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bstan pa ltar na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi theg
299b7(khri brgyad): pa pa gcig pur 'gyuraro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gnas brtan rab
299b8(khri brgyad): 'byor byang chub gcig kyang 'dod dam/ zhes gnas brtan rab 'byor la dri dgo so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
300a1(khri brgyad): smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod dam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 
300a2(khri brgyad): gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' gsum 'dod dam/ nyan thos
300a3(khri brgyad): kyi theg pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dod dam
300a4(khri brgyad): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yi no// smras pa/ tshe/ dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci de bzhin nyid la byang chubab sems dpa' gsum du dmigs sam/ smras
300a5(khri brgyad): yi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor don ma yin na// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid la rnam pa gcig ga mo// gnyis sam/ gsum du dmigs sam/ smras / 
300a6(khri brgyad): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang dmigs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
300a7(khri brgyad): ba rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ de ltar dben pa'i tshul bzhin du chos de dag mi dmigs na/ ci las tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du byang chub
300a8(khri brgyad): sems dpa' 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba
300b1(khri brgyad): zhes bya bar sems par gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis bye brag med par rab tu phye ba/ 
300b2(khri brgyad): la byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod pa med pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar
300b3(khri brgyad): 'gyu ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus rab 'byor khyod spobs pa legaso legaso// rab
